String.Source: We can talk about that later. Here, drink this bottle.
String.Dest: 我们可以等会再讨论这个，给，把这瓶子里的东西给喝掉。

String.Source: We can talk about that later. Here, drink this bottle.
String.Dest: 我们可以等会再讨论这个，给，把这瓶子里的东西给喝掉。

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: I want to talk about Sahlene.
String.Dest: 我想谈谈Sahlene的事。

String.Source: I want to talk about Sahlene.
String.Dest: 我想谈谈Sahlene的事。

String.Source: How about my house in Windhelm?
String.Dest: 我在风盔城的房子怎么样？

String.Source: Honeyside, my house in Riften.
String.Dest: 甜蜜湾，我在裂谷城的房子。

String.Source: My house in Markarth would be perfect.
String.Dest: 我在马卡斯城的房子将会很完美。

String.Source: Let's live in my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 让我们住在我在独孤城的房子里吧。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: I know where we can find Sahlene.
String.Dest: 我知道我们能从哪儿找到索伦。

String.Source: Breezehome, my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 风宅，我在雪漫城的房子。

String.Source: Hold on. I'll find a way to cure you.
String.Dest: 坚持住，我想办法救你。

String.Source: Hold on. I'll find a way to cure you.
String.Dest: 坚持住，我想办法救你。

String.Source: Hold on. I'll find a way to cure you.
String.Dest: 坚持住，我想办法救你。

String.Source: Never mind that fool. Drink this.
String.Dest: 别管那个白痴。喝了它。

String.Source: Never mind that fool. Drink this.
String.Dest: 别管那个白痴。喝了它。

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: Proudspire Manor, my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 傲矛别墅，我在独孤城的家。

String.Source: Hjerim, my house in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 霜宅，我在风盔城的房子。

String.Source: I have a house in Riften.
String.Dest: 我在裂谷城有栋房子。

String.Source: We could live in my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 我们可以住在我在雪漫城的房子里。

String.Source: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic
String.Dest: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic

String.Source: Let's do this. You. Me. The Chapel of Riften. Let's get married.
String.Dest: 就让我们这么办，你跟我，在裂谷城的教堂里结婚吧。

String.Source: I know, but we should probably stay friends.
String.Dest: 我知道，但我们应该做朋友。

String.Source: Vlindrel Hall, my house in Markarth.
String.Dest: 林德尔会堂，我在马卡斯城的房子。

String.Source: This is not time to be sitting down. Get up.
String.Dest: 现在不是坐的时候，赶紧起来。

String.Source: This is not time to be sitting down. Get up.
String.Dest: 现在不是坐的时候，赶紧起来。

String.Source: This is not time to be sitting down. Get up.
String.Dest: 现在不是坐的时候，赶紧起来。

String.Source: What will you say to Sahlene if you find her?
String.Dest: 如果你遇到Sahlene你會對她說什麼？

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园

String.Source: A potion should fix you right up.
String.Dest: 一瓶药水就能马上帮你解决。

String.Source: A potion should fix you right up.
String.Dest: 一瓶药水就能马上帮你解决。

String.Source: A potion should fix you right up.
String.Dest: 一瓶药水就能马上帮你解决。

String.Source: Is there a chance you're interested in me?
String.Dest: 是否有机会，你对我感兴趣？

String.Source: Somewhere over there. Just follow me.
String.Dest: 就在那边不远，跟我来！

String.Source: Dawnstar.
String.Dest: 晨星。

String.Source: I'd like us to move somewhere else.
String.Dest: 我想我们得移动到别的地方。

String.Source: I would love to, my dashing Prince. Here you are, a homecooked meal, and a kiss for good luck from your princess.
String.Dest: 哦我英俊潇洒的王子，我很乐意。奉上一桌子家常菜以及来自于你的公主的祝福之吻，献给你。

String.Source: Dwarven ruins. Smooth floors, exacting architecture. These are by far my favorite places to raid.
String.Dest: 矮人遗迹。光滑的地板，精致的建筑。是我目前为止最爱闯荡的地方。

String.Source: I wouldn't believe it if I didn't see it with my own eyes...Wow.
String.Dest: 如果没亲眼看过的话我还真不相信……哇哦。

String.Source: That sounds great. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 好主意。我在那里等你。

String.Source: That sounds great. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 好主意。我在那里等你。

String.Source: That sounds great. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 好主意。我在那里等你。

String.Source: That sounds great. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 好主意。我在那里等你。

String.Source: Sure. I'll get our things. Um, don't be mad if I drop some of it on the way.
String.Dest: 当然，我会拿到我们要的东西。呃，要是我在路上掉了一些可别生气。

String.Source: Sure. I'll get our things. Um, don't be mad if I drop some of it on the way.
String.Dest: 当然，我会拿到我们要的东西。呃，要是我在路上掉了一些可别生气。

String.Source: Sure. I'll get our things. Um, don't be mad if I drop some of it on the way.
String.Dest: 当然，我会拿到我们要的东西。呃，要是我在路上掉了一些可别生气。

String.Source: Sure. I'll get our things. Um, don't be mad if I drop some of it on the way.
String.Dest: 当然，我会拿到我们要的东西。呃，要是我在路上掉了一些可别生气。

String.Source: Then we can go to Shadow's Gulch, and end this once and for all.
String.Dest: 然后我们可以去阴影峡谷，然后一劳永逸的结束。

String.Source: I was probably just as foolish, seeing as I tried to go with him. Never made it out of the bed.
String.Dest: 我也许是个白痴，从试着跟他走这点来看。我还没离开过床呢。

String.Source: Then lead the way.
String.Dest: 那带路吧。

String.Source: That sounds great. I'll see you there.
String.Dest: 听起来不错。我在那里见你吧。

String.Source: That sounds great. I'll see you there.
String.Dest: 听起来不错。我在那里见你吧。

String.Source: It...it was on her body. Here.
String.Dest: 这……这是从她身上找到的。给你。

String.Source: It...it was on her body. Here.
String.Dest: 这……这是从她身上找到的。给你。

String.Source: It...it was on her body. Here.
String.Dest: 这……这是从她身上找到的。给你。

String.Source: That's a beautiful amulet...where have I seen it before?
String.Dest: 这真是一个美丽的护身符…我是不是之前在哪见过你？

String.Source: Nord ruins. Ancient. Dangerous. Watch the walls, and assume everything's alive.
String.Dest: 诺德遗迹。古老的。危险的。看墙壁，承担一切都活着。.

String.Source: Wow, this is a big home love! I hope I don't make a mess of it.
String.Dest: 嚯，好一副全家大团圆的温馨场面啊！希望我的出现没有破坏气氛。

String.Source: Is it that obvious? I never did hide my feelings very well.
String.Dest: 这还看不出来么？我就从没隐藏过自己的情绪。

String.Source: That sounds great. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 听起来不错。我在那里跟你碰面吧。

String.Source: That sounds great. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 听起来不错。我在那里跟你碰面吧。

String.Source: You do? Where?
String.Dest: 你确定？在哪？

String.Source: We're married! Where should we live?
String.Dest: 我们结婚了！我们应该去哪住？

String.Source: I...I understand. I'm sorry for making things so awkward.
String.Dest: 我……我懂了。我很抱歉把事情搞定如此尴尬。

String.Source: I know. It's just...I thought I was going to die. But it's just a knife wound. Nothing a potion can't fix..
String.Dest: 我知道，只是…我当时觉得我要死了。但是那只是个刀伤，一瓶药剂就能解决…

String.Source: I don't really know. All of this is my fault. Saying sorry won't be enough.
String.Dest: 我真不确定。这一切都是我的错。说多少抱歉的话也不够。

String.Source: I told you I'm fine. I thought I was dead for sure, but it's just a knife wound. Nothing a potion can't fix..
String.Dest: 我告诉你我很好。我觉得我那时真的要挂掉了，虽然那只是一把匕首伤的。但没有是药剂不能治的..

String.Source: In any case, the nightblade told me where he was headed. Shadow's Gulch, a valley to the east of here. We can leave as soon as you're ready.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，夜莺把他的动向都告诉我了。暗影峡谷,这里的东边的一个山谷。我们准备好了就出发。

String.Source: In my heart, I always prayed she was still alive. But now, seeing her like this, I fear the girl I knew is already dead.
String.Dest: 我总是在心里祈祷她还活着。但现在，看到她这样，我担心我认识的那个女孩已经死了。

String.Source: Sure. I'll get our things. Um, don't be mad if I drop some of it on the way.
String.Dest: 好吧。我就去拿我们的东西。嗯……如果我路上掉了啥的话你可不要抓狂啊。

String.Source: Sure. I'll get our things. Um, don't be mad if I drop some of it on the way.
String.Dest: 好吧。我就去拿我们的东西。嗯……如果我路上掉了啥的话你可不要抓狂啊。

String.Source: Sure. I'll get our things. Um, don't be mad if I drop some of it on the way.
String.Dest: 好吧。我就去拿我们的东西。嗯……如果我路上掉了啥的话你可不要抓狂啊。

String.Source: Sure. I'll get our things. Um, don't be mad if I drop some of it on the way.
String.Dest: 好吧。我就去拿我们的东西。嗯……如果我路上掉了啥的话你可不要抓狂啊。

String.Source: A cave. An adventurer's lifeblood.
String.Dest: 一个山洞. 是一个冒险家的命脉.

String.Source: So, how are the wedding preparations coming along? I admit, I'm getting a bit antsy. It almost feels like the days before a battle.
String.Dest: 所以，我们该如何筹备婚礼？我承认，自己实在有点不知所措。这感觉简直跟要上战场一样。

String.Source: I still don't know what's wrong with me. I've never been this sick before. But if you think it will help, I'll drink it.
String.Dest: 我还是不知道自己究竟是什么病。而且以前我也没有得过这种病。但是如果你真的认为这药能够凑效的话，我会喝下去的。

String.Source: Then let's go.
String.Dest: 那就出发。

String.Source: By Mara, yes! And the chapel's perfect! Wow, I'm getting married! And as far as I know, Oblivion hasn't frozen over. Take that, Jorn.
String.Dest: 以玛拉之名，是的！而且教堂非常完美！哇，我要结婚了！ And as far as I know, Oblivion hasn't frozen over. Take that, Jorn.

String.Source: I don't think I need one. I thought I was dead for sure. But he missed my heart by a few inches.
String.Dest: 我不认为我需要一个。我以为自己必死无疑了。但他堪堪错过了我的心脏几英寸。

String.Source: Where should we live?
String.Dest: 我们该住哪里?

String.Source: Maybe I got lucky, or maybe he's toying with us. But we have the Trinity Blade now, so he must be getting scared.
String.Dest: 也许我走了好运，也可能是他正玩我们呢。但是我们现在有了三体之刃，所以他现在肯定吓坏了。

String.Source: Maybe I got lucky, or maybe he's toying with us. But we have the Trinity Blade now, so he must be getting scared.
String.Dest: 也许我走了好运，也可能是他正玩我们呢。但是我们现在有了三体之刃，所以他现在肯定吓坏了。

String.Source: Maybe I got lucky, or maybe he's toying with us. But we have the Trinity Blade now, so he must be getting scared.
String.Dest: 也许我走了好运，也可能是他正玩我们呢。但是我们现在有了三体之刃，所以他现在肯定吓坏了。

String.Source: My love, what's done is done. Don't worry about it.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，过去的都过去了。别再担心了。

String.Source: My love, what's done is done. Don't worry about it.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，过去的都过去了。别再担心了。

String.Source: Every Sundas?
String.Dest: 每个星期天？

String.Source: You can stop now. I've found our nightblade.
String.Dest: 你可以停手了。我已经发现我们的nightblade了。

String.Source: We make things right by sending Deneris to the void.
String.Dest: 架空 Deneris 我们算是作对了。

String.Source: We make things right by sending Deneris to the void.
String.Dest: 架空 Deneris 我们算是作对了。

String.Source: She was a friend.
String.Dest: 她只是朋友。

String.Source: She was a friend.
String.Dest: 她只是朋友。

String.Source: I'm sorry for your loss. Yet justice was served.
String.Dest: 对你的损失我很抱歉，然而正义已被伸张。

String.Source: I'm sorry for your loss. Yet justice was served.
String.Dest: 对你的损失我很抱歉，然而正义已被伸张。

String.Source: Doing what's right isn't always easy.
String.Dest: 做正确的事并不总是那么简单。

String.Source: Doing what's right isn't always easy.
String.Dest: 做正确的事并不总是那么简单。

String.Source: Doing what's right isn't always easy.
String.Dest: 做正确的事并不总是那么简单。

String.Source: Killing her felt pretty right to me.
String.Dest: 对我来说，把她杀了真是太明智了。

String.Source: Killing her felt pretty right to me.
String.Dest: 对我来说，把她杀了真是太明智了。

String.Source: Just be careful where you step from now on.
String.Dest: 从现在起要随时注意脚下的状况。

String.Source: Just be careful where you step from now on.
String.Dest: 从现在起要随时注意脚下的状况。

String.Source: What's done is done. Don't worry about it.
String.Dest: 过去的就过去了。不要再为它费心。

String.Source: What's done is done. Don't worry about it.
String.Dest: 过去的就过去了。不要再为它费心。

String.Source: What's done is done. Don't worry about it.
String.Dest: 过去的就过去了。不要再为它费心。

String.Source: What's done is done. Don't worry about it.
String.Dest: 过去的就过去了。不要再为它费心。

String.Source: It's just too bad about Lorne. I liked him.
String.Dest: 洛恩的事真是遗憾。我很喜欢他。

String.Source: It's just too bad about Lorne. I liked him.
String.Dest: 洛恩的事真是遗憾。我很喜欢他。

String.Source: To make things right, you first have to commit a wrong. We did no such thing.
String.Dest: 想把事情做对的话，你不得不先犯个错误。而我们没有做这样的事。

String.Source: To make things right, you first have to commit a wrong. We did no such thing.
String.Dest: 想把事情做对的话，你不得不先犯个错误。而我们没有做这样的事。

String.Source: But first things first. We still owe Lorne's friend an artifact. This nightblade's dagger will probably do for now.
String.Dest: 但最重要的是. 我们仍有Lorne朋友的一件手艺品. 这把夜刃匕首很可能现在就要派上用场.

String.Source: I think I might stay here tonight. Did you know the price of a room here is the same as the Windpeak Inn? You should probably stay as well.
String.Dest: 我看今晚我就住这儿了。你知道吗这儿的房间价格跟 Windpeak Inn 完全一样？ 恐怕你也应该住下。

String.Source: No, Sahlene. You're wrong.
String.Dest: 不，索伦，你错了。

String.Source: We can talk about this more at the inn. Right now, I need some time alone.
String.Dest: 我们可以在酒馆多聊聊这个。现在，我需要一点独处的时间。

String.Source: We can talk about this more at the inn. Right now, I need some time alone.
String.Dest: 我们可以在酒馆多聊聊这个。现在，我需要一点独处的时间。

String.Source: We can talk about this more at the inn. Right now, I need some time alone.
String.Dest: 我们可以在酒馆多聊聊这个。现在，我需要一点独处的时间。

String.Source: We can talk about this more at the inn. Right now, I need some time alone.
String.Dest: 我们可以在酒馆多聊聊这个。现在，我需要一点独处的时间。

String.Source: In any case, we still owe Lorne's friend an artifact. This nightblade's dagger will probably do for now.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我们还欠洛恩的朋友一把神器。这把夜刃的匕首倒是挺合适的。

String.Source: In any case, we still owe Lorne's friend an artifact. This nightblade's dagger will probably do for now.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我们还欠洛恩的朋友一把神器。这把夜刃的匕首倒是挺合适的。

String.Source: In any case, we still owe Lorne's friend an artifact. This nightblade's dagger will probably do for now.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我们还欠洛恩的朋友一把神器。这把夜刃的匕首倒是挺合适的。

String.Source: In any case, we still owe Lorne's friend an artifact. This nightblade's dagger will probably do for now.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我们还欠洛恩的朋友一把神器。这把夜刃的匕首倒是挺合适的。

String.Source: Every Sundas?
String.Dest: 每个周日？

String.Source: I'm coming too. It's not as bad as you...ugh...think.
String.Dest: 我也来了。还没你那么坏……啊呸……我是说还没你想的那么坏。

String.Source: Dragonborn! What are you-
String.Dest: 龙裔，你究竟怎么了－

String.Source: Damn Deneris...only cowards try to stab you in the back...
String.Dest: 该死的丹尼勒斯……只有懦夫才会在你背后捅刀子...

String.Source: I suppose that drunk is the one who's really to blame, and the fool got what he deserved.
String.Dest: 我想这个酒鬼真该被责备。而这个呆子他活该。

String.Source: Shor's breath...I'm feeling a bit dizzy...I need to sit down.
String.Dest: 舒尔的气息……我感到有点头晕 ……我得坐下来。

String.Source: All right, the eastern shore's only a few days hike from here. We should hurry if we want to join the fight.
String.Dest: 确实，从这里到东海岸只需要徒步走几天。但如果我们还打算参战的话，那就快点儿。

String.Source: Some things. But not everything.
String.Dest: 一些事情。但不是所有事情都如此。

String.Source: I...I think it's just the shock. I'll be fine.
String.Dest: 我……我想我只是有点儿震惊。我没事儿。

String.Source: I was just being aggressive. Sometimes you step on a trap or two. Besides, I don't think those nightblades would've believed us anyway.
String.Dest: 我正准备开始警戒呢，说不准什么时候你就踩到陷阱了。不过话说回来，我不认为那些夜莺会信任我们。

String.Source: Dragonborn! Are you awake?
String.Dest: 龙裔，你醒了么？

String.Source: Unngh...You...just missed Soren. He came back for his dagger...said he was going after Deneris...but he didn't have time to wait.
String.Dest: 嗯……你……错过了索尔恩。他回来拿了匕首……他说要去找丹尼勒斯算账……但是他没有时间再等了。

String.Source: How often does she come by?
String.Dest: 她多久才经过一次？

String.Source: I agree. But the same goes for her. It couldn't have been easy for her to come here, knowing how it would end.
String.Dest: 我同意，但她也一样。对她来说，能来这里很不容易，也知道它会有个怎样的结局。

String.Source: I...I know we did the right thing. But why does it feel so wrong?
String.Dest: 我...我知道我们这样做是对的。但为什么总感觉做错了？

String.Source: But there's no point shaming the dead. And we still owe the man in Dawnstar an artifact. Maybe that nightblade's dagger will do.
String.Dest: 但玷污死者毫无意义。而且我们还欠那个在晨星城的人一个神器呢。或许用这把夜莺匕首可以交差。

String.Source: Then you have no feelings at all. She was still my friend, and I thought you were mine. But maybe I was wrong.
String.Dest: 而你根本没有感情。她仍然是我的朋友，并且我以为你是属于我的，但也许我错了。

String.Source: It's been a long day. We can think about it tomorrow. Right now, I'm just glad you're okay.
String.Dest: 真是漫长的一天啊。我们可以明天再来梳理今天的事情。现在，我很高兴你平安无恙。

String.Source: Ugh...
Everything I am is because of you. You taught me how to fight, how to live with honor and protect the weak.
String.Dest: 一切事物 我是因为你.你教授我如何战斗, 如何荣耀的活着和保护弱者。.

String.Source: Maybe she didn't want me to live with the burden of letting a killer go free.
String.Dest: 也许她不想要我背负使得凶手逍遥法外的的包袱。

String.Source: She was a good person. Maybe sacrificing herself is her way of telling me she still is.
String.Dest: 她是个好人。也许她牺牲自己只是想告诉我她仍然是个好姑娘，从来没变过。

String.Source: I'm married actually. To him.
String.Dest: 我确实已经结婚了。他是我的另一半。

String.Source: Thank the Divines. I don't think I can spend another minute in here. But we'd better check with him and make sure it's the right one.
String.Dest: 感谢诸神。我不认为我能在这再待一分钟，但是我们最好和他商量一下来确定一下是否就是这个。

String.Source: At the base is a cave. Some of Deneris' men were spotted outside. The nightblade thinks that's where his spirit revives.
String.Dest: 在那个洞穴的基地里，一些丹尼勒斯的人被挂在外面。夜莺认为这是他灵魂的复兴。

String.Source: Sahlene...
String.Dest: 索伦……

String.Source: Goodbye, my love.
String.Dest: 再见，我的宝贝。

String.Source: Unngh...You...just missed one of Soren's brothers. A nightblade. He said he was going after Deneris...that he didn't have time to wait.
String.Dest: 啊哦...你...刚好跟Soren的那个弟弟错过. 他是个夜刃。他说正在追缉Deneris…呃，所以没有时间来等。

String.Source: I'm fine Sahlene. Although my chest feels like it's on fire. But I think I just need a moment to...let the potion take effect...
String.Dest: 我没事 Sahlene。虽说我的胸口有点灼烧感。不过我想药水喝完后得待会儿……才能见效。

String.Source: Not just any friend. A dear one. She had such strong ideals. Maybe this is her way of telling me she never gave them up.
String.Dest: 并不仅仅是朋友而已，她是我最亲密的那个朋友。她的理念是如此地坚定不移。或许她那样做就是为了告诉我她永远不会放弃她的信念。

String.Source: My love! Are you awake?
String.Dest: 吾爱！你醒了吗？

String.Source: Wake up! He's here!
String.Dest: 快醒醒！他在这里！

String.Source: I owe you my life. I will never take yours.
String.Dest: 【我欠你一条命，我将永远站在你这一边。】

String.Source: Why? He was useless as a scholar and helpless in a fight. And I'm not entirely sure he wasn't working for Deneris all along.
String.Dest: 为什么？这家伙要算是学者呢他一事无成，要算是战士呢他手无缚鸡之力。而且我都不知道他一直以来是在为丹尼勒斯服务。

String.Source: I'm married actually. To her.
String.Dest: 我真的结婚了。跟她一起。

String.Source: (Sigh) I know, but I just can't shake the feeling it's my fault. And that spirit we delivered, I doubt we've heard the last of him.
String.Dest: (叹气)我懂，但还是感觉是我的错。我们传播的精神，我怀疑是他仅剩的了。

String.Source: My love, we should stay here for the night. I didn't believe it at first, but the rooms here really are as cheap as the Windpeak Inn!
String.Dest: 亲爱的我们就在这过夜吧。我刚开始还不信，但这的放假真的和Windpeak Inn一样便宜!

String.Source: Aye, I noticed there were only three that died in that chamber, not counting Lorne. Which means whatever he is, he's still out there.
String.Dest: 赞成，我注意到室内只有三个尸体, 不算 Lorne. 这意味着不管他是什么，他依然逍遥法外.

String.Source: I think we know why. Supposedly it's the only thing that can kill Deneris.
String.Dest: 我想我知道原因。 恐怕这是唯一能杀死Deneris的东西了。

String.Source: I'm a bounty hunter, actually, when I'm not traveling with my friend here.
String.Dest: 如果不和朋友一起旅行，实际上我是一个赏金猎人。

String.Source: Goodbye.
String.Dest: 再见。

String.Source: Out for some fresh air, love?
String.Dest: 出去透下气，亲爱的？

String.Source: Wait here for a moment.
String.Dest: 在这儿等一下.

String.Source: Yeah, sure, why not. The more the merrier.
String.Dest: 好的，的确，为啥不呢。越多越好。

String.Source: My wife, I want nothing more than to have you with me.
String.Dest: 我的爱人，对我来说，有你在我身边就足够了。.

String.Source: There's a bounty on some lout making trouble in Winterhold.
String.Dest: 有个对在冬堡惹麻烦的蠢货的悬赏。

String.Source: There's a bounty on some lout making trouble in Winterhold.
String.Dest: 有个对在冬堡惹麻烦的蠢货的悬赏。

String.Source: There's a bounty on some lout making trouble in Winterhold.
String.Dest: 有个对在冬堡惹麻烦的蠢货的悬赏。

String.Source: Out for some fresh air, I take it?
String.Dest: 我想，出去透个气？

String.Source: Wait here.
String.Dest: 在这里等着。

String.Source: I think I've found the right corpse.
String.Dest: 我想我已经找到了合适的尸体。

String.Source: You chop wood like a bloody grasshopper. But you get results.
String.Dest: 你砍木头的时候就像个嗜血的蝗虫一样。不过至少有结果了。

String.Source: You chop wood like a bloody grasshopper. But you get results.
String.Dest: 你砍木头的时候就像个嗜血的蝗虫一样。不过至少有结果了。

String.Source: Supposedly there's a man in Winterhold who knows how to find an ancient tomb.
String.Dest: 据推测，冬堡有个男的知道怎么找到古墓。

String.Source: Supposedly there's a man in Winterhold who knows how to find an ancient tomb.
String.Dest: 据推测，冬堡有个男的知道怎么找到古墓。

String.Source: Supposedly there's a man in Winterhold who knows how to find an ancient tomb.
String.Dest: 据推测，冬堡有个男的知道怎么找到古墓。

String.Source: I'd be honored to have you by my side.
String.Dest: 我会很荣幸有你在身边。

String.Source: I think you're rather elegant.
String.Dest: 你可真够优雅。

String.Source: I think you're rather elegant.
String.Dest: 你可真够优雅。

String.Source: Just don't get in my way.
String.Dest: 别给我碍事就行！

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Follow me.
String.Dest: 跟我走。

String.Source: Follow me.
String.Dest: 跟我走。

String.Source: I have some errands to run. I'll meet the two of you there.
String.Dest: 我还有差事要做。我会在那里见你们俩。

String.Source: Now and forever.
String.Dest: 现在和永远。

String.Source: Just try to behave for once in your life, Lorne.
String.Dest: 你就想着这辈子就这么一回，洛恩。

String.Source: Sounds like an adventure. And if that's the case, I ought to come with you.
String.Dest: 听起来像一场冒险。如果是这样的话,我应该跟你一起去。

String.Source: And even if there's more than one, we can narrow it down by the weapons they're buried with.
String.Dest: 即使这里不止一个，我们也能用那些陪葬的武器给他们点颜色瞧瞧。

String.Source: I was talking about the bodies we defiled.
String.Dest: 我在说这些被我们亵渎的尸体。

String.Source: I won't let you down.
String.Dest: 我不会让你倒下的。

String.Source: And results are what matter. I've seen bar fights where miners beat down a trained guardsman, simply by being aggressive.
String.Dest: 结果是怎么回事。我见过在酒吧的打斗中战胜训练有素的卫兵的矿工，进取心让这变得如此简单。.

String.Source: Good. You won't be sorry.
String.Dest: 很好，你不会后悔的。

String.Source: I wanted to do something that would make Sahlene proud. But if someone like you is willing to hunt bounties, then maybe there's more to this work.
String.Dest: 我想做一些能让Sahlene骄傲的事情。但是如果一些像你这样的人愿意做赏金猎人的话，也许我能把事情做大一点。

String.Source: Eyargh!
String.Dest: 咿呀！

String.Source: Alright, let's split up and see what we can find.
String.Dest: 好吧，我们分头行动看看能找到什么。

String.Source: So that's why the Jarl's men came by. I was tempted to go in there myself, but I've been trying to avoid taking small bounties.
String.Dest: 那就是领主的人来这儿的目的。我曾经想一个人搞定，不过总觉得不想接这种赏金太低的活儿。

String.Source: What...what happened?
String.Dest: 发…发生了什么？

String.Source: You were saying about the corpses?
String.Dest: 你是说这尸体？

String.Source: I know my back's a little crooked, but it's as strong as an ox.
String.Dest: 我知道我的背有点儿驼，但它还是强壮如牛。

String.Source: Damn that alchemist...bone break fever! Could a woman with bone break fever do this?
String.Dest: 该死的炼金术师……什么骨痛热！有骨痛热的女人能这么做吗？

String.Source: Then we should get going. I'd rather not spend another minute in this place after what we've done.
String.Dest: 快走快走。在我们做了那些事儿后，我不想在这个地方多呆一分钟了。

String.Source: You made it, and just in time. I was just about to push Lorne down the mountain. Glad we avoided that. Lead the way.
String.Dest: 你做到了，分秒不差。我正要把洛恩推下山呢。很高兴避免了这一情况。带路吧。

String.Source: There's got to be a way to make things right.
String.Dest: 肯定有办法的。

String.Source: You're mad.
String.Dest: 你疯了。

String.Source: That's cute, but I'm an adventurer now.
String.Dest: 有意思，但我现在是一个冒险家了。

String.Source: I may sound like a hypocrite for saying this but...that man looks nothing like a scholar.
String.Dest: 我说这些话也许听起来像个伪君子但……但……那个人看起来怎么也不像是个学者。

String.Source: We can always come back to the inn to make sure. Trust me, it'll be faster than waiting for this one to sober up.
String.Dest: 我们可以随时回来确认一下。信我的，总比等这家伙酒醒要快。

String.Source: So how does this cadaver help us get inside?
String.Dest: 所以这尸体怎么帮我们进到里边？

String.Source: I don't know what you're talking about.
String.Dest: 我不知道你在说什么。

String.Source: Don't underestimate me. I know how we met, but that isn't the real me. I only look like I need help.
String.Dest: 别小瞧我。我知道我们是怎么认识的，但那不是真正的我。我只是看上去像是需要你的帮助罢了。

String.Source: I take it not just any corpse will do?
String.Dest: 我猜不是每具尸体都可以？

String.Source: Ugh! Forget the drunk! We can do this on our own, now that we know the corpse is branded.
String.Dest: 额！别管那酒鬼了。既然已经知道尸体上被刻了标识，我们自己也能干成这事儿。

String.Source: Wait!
String.Dest: 等等！

String.Source: Ha, now who's making things awkward. Your words are kind, but I don't need them. I know what I am.
String.Dest: 啊哈，现在是谁不懂气氛啊。你的本意是好的，但我并不需要什么帮助，我有自知之明。

String.Source: Loyalty is more important than any paradise. It doesn't matter where you go when you die, but who's there waiting for you.
String.Dest: 忠诚比起任何天堂都更加重要。死在你前进的路上并不可怕，重要的是谁在你路途的前方等你。

String.Source: But they would have killed you if we didn't stop them!
String.Dest: 如果你刚刚不杀了他们，他们就会杀你。

String.Source: Damn! I feel so used. It's our fault these people died.
String.Dest: 玩儿蛋！老子这是彻底被耍了。是我们的错导致了这些人的丧生。

String.Source: You make me blush, love, but you know I feel the same.
String.Dest: 你让我脸红，吾爱，但是你知道我的感受是一样的。

String.Source: It's almost like I can hear Sahlene's voice in my head, telling me to stop wasting time with small bounties.
String.Dest: 就好象我能在脑海里听到Sahlene的声音，告诉我不要为了一点点的奖赏而浪费时间。

String.Source: And how do you know all this?
String.Dest: 你怎么知道这一切的？

String.Source: Damn, this one doesn't have any markings either. Any luck on your end?
String.Dest: 该死的，这个人没有任何的标记。你那头有什么消息吗？

String.Source: I'm a warrior, and a bounty hunter. One who's looking for work. Speaking of which, did you find any at the inn?
String.Dest: 我是战士，也是赏金猎人。以剑换钱之人。说到这里，你在旅馆里见过这类人了？

String.Source: Same goes bounty hunters. You have to get to your man first. I take it that's why you were at the inn, looking for work.
String.Dest: 赏金猎人一样，你需要先找到你的委托人。我觉得那就是你在旅馆找工作的原因。

String.Source: I was trying to stop them!
String.Dest: 我试图阻止他们！

String.Source: Aye, fresh air and exercise. You know how it is, neither of us can stay cooped up for long. Did you find any work at the inn?
String.Dest: 是啊，锻炼和新鲜空气。你知道这是怎么回事，我们谁都不能长久的宅着。你在酒馆找到什么活儿了吗？

String.Source: Aye, fresh air and exercise. You know how it is, neither of us can stay cooped up for long. Did you find any work at the inn?
String.Dest: 是啊，锻炼和新鲜空气。你知道这是怎么回事，我们谁都不能长久的宅着。你在酒馆找到什么活儿了吗？

String.Source: Is that it? Hm...better check with the drunk. I'll keep looking around.
String.Dest: 是这样吗？嗯……最好再检查一下那个醉鬼。我会在附近接着找找看。

String.Source: Okay, but be careful. If you need my blade, I'll be at my sister's.
String.Dest: 好吧，但自己小心点儿。如果你需要我为你而战的话，我就在我姐姐那儿。

String.Source: You'd be the first. Most people don't show me that kind of respect, so I...I'm thankful for your words.
String.Dest: 你是第一个对我如此温柔的人。大多数人都不会给予我如此的尊重，我……我很感谢你说出这番话。

String.Source: Damn that drunk! He'll probably pin this on us! We better chase after him!
String.Dest: 该死的酒！他很可能会用这个来压着我们！我们最好马上追上他！

String.Source: Good. I was beginning to think that drunk took us for fools. But we'd better check with him and make sure it's the right one.
String.Dest: 好的，我有点怀疑是不是酒精让我们变傻了。 我们最好还是仔细检查一下他，看他是不是真的。

String.Source: You've never been inside a cave before, have you. This is just the entrance. It opens up further down.
String.Dest: 你原来从来没进过洞穴把，这还只是洞口。后面会更深。

String.Source: So if you're headed to Winterhold, then I'm right behind you.
String.Dest: 如果你要去冬堡，我和你一起。

String.Source: So if you're headed to Winterhold, then I'm right behind you.
String.Dest: 如果你要去冬堡，我和你一起。

String.Source: Alright. I'll do my best to keep this one alive. But if he does die, at least we can collect the bounty.
String.Dest: 好吧，我会尽我所能让这家伙活着。但是如果他还是死了，至少我们还能拿点赏金。

String.Source: A spellsword would never carry a warhammer, or a shield.
String.Dest: 一个魔剑士永远不会用战锤或者是盾牌。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Take your time.
String.Dest: 抓紧时间。

String.Source: It's nothing. Never mind.
String.Dest: 没什么事，不用担心。

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你为我做件事情。

String.Source: Yes. Let me show you.
String.Dest: 不错，你看看。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的

String.Source: Damn you!
String.Dest: 混蛋！

String.Source: Caves are like skooma to an adventurer. Sweet, addictive, and deadly.
String.Dest: 洞穴对冒险者来说如同斯库玛。甜蜜，令人上瘾，并致命。

String.Source: Take whatever you need, I can manage.
String.Dest: 无论你需要什么，我都会设法去做。

String.Source: Mm! Smell that fresh air. Today is good day for a battle.
String.Dest: 恩!闻闻这新鲜的空气。今天是战斗的好日子啊。

String.Source: Ugh!
String.Dest: 啊！

String.Source: Just name it.
String.Dest: 尽管说

String.Source: They say the guardsmen here are the best in all of Skyrim. I'd love to test my mettle against them.
String.Dest: 他们说全天际省最牛狠角色是守卫。我很想找他们练练胆。

String.Source: My relationship with my sister was for a lack of a better word...awkward. But we respected our differences, and each other.
String.Dest: 我跟姐姐的关系很难用别的词形容，只有尴尬。不过我们尊重彼此的差异，和姐妹情份。

String.Source: Take your time.
String.Dest: 慢慢儿来。

String.Source: Sounds good.
String.Dest: 听起来不错。

String.Source: These old barrows are where we bury our ancestors, and if you aren't careful, where our ancestors will bury us.
String.Dest: 这些古坟是我们埋葬祖先的地方，如果你不小心的话，我们的祖先可是会葬了我们的啊。

String.Source: Dawnstar was once a thriving port town. The East Empire Company all but put an end to that. All ships coming from the north dock at Solitude.
String.Dest: 晨星城曾经是一个繁荣的港口城市。东帝国贸易公司结束了这一切。 所有船只都来自独孤城的北方码头。

String.Source: I know it's crazy, but sometimes I still hold out hope that Sahlene's out there. And that's she still Sahlene.
String.Dest: 我知道我疯了。但有时候我仍希望索伦还在那里。而且她仍然是我认识的那个索伦。

String.Source: They say the Falmer were once people. Horrible ones, I bet.
String.Dest: 他们说雪精灵曾经是人类。但我敢打赌，就算是人，他们也是顶可怕的那类。

String.Source: Jorn used to tell me I ran like a Falmer, and walked like a mudcrab. I think he was right.
String.Dest: Jorn常常跟我说，我跑起来像个雪精灵，走起来像个泥沼蟹。我觉得他是对的.

String.Source: It's always good to pray after a long adventure. You never know what sort of diseases you can pick up on the open road.
String.Dest: 在一场漫长的冒险后的祈祷总是好的。你永远也不会知道在旅行的道路上你感染上了什么病。

String.Source: I wonder what Draugr dream about. They look so peaceful lying there.
String.Dest: 我不知道尸鬼可以梦见什么。他们看起来是如此安详的躺在那里。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: Vampires? (Scoffs) I eat vampires for breakfast.
String.Dest: 吸血鬼？（嘲笑声）我一般拿他们来当早饭。

String.Source: So many children have been orphaned by the war. I'm surprised Riften is the only city that offers them shelter.
String.Dest: 有那么多孩子都在战争中成为了孤儿，却只有裂谷城愿为他们提供庇护，真让我惊讶。

String.Source: The Empire shouldn't have bargained with the heathens. In the guard we took bets on who'd be the first to introduce their knuckles to a Thalmor chin.
String.Dest: 帝国不该跟异教徒做交易。我们在守卫身上打赌，赌他们中的哪一个会最先屈服于梭默。

String.Source: Whiterun. They call this land the divide. Every person in this hold has been affected by the war, and they wear it on their faces like a helm.
String.Dest: 雪漫城。他们管这片土地叫做分界线。每个在这领地的居民都受了战争的影响，而他们把(若无其事的表情)像头盔那般的戴在脸上。

String.Source: This may surprise you, but the Orcs consider me blood-kin. Saved a lost child from some bandits a few years back.
String.Dest: 这可能会让你大吃一惊，但这些兽人们把我当作血亲看待。我是他们几年前从强盗手中救回了一个迷路的孩子。

String.Source: Without any decent trade, the port's become a hub for pirates, brigands, and every filthy piece of flotsam that manages to float to shore.
String.Dest: 这个港口早已没有正常的交易。剩下的只有海盗和强盗的据点，以及被冲上沙滩的破木片。

String.Source: What day is it, Fredas? The Windpeak Inn's probably full of sailors, with Karita screaming across the hall, and poor Jaspar sulking in the corner.
String.Dest: 今天是什么日子， Fredas？整个风岳旅店放眼看去全是水手，大厅对面儿Karita在尖叫，而贾斯珀可怜兮兮的蹲在墙角儿。

String.Source: My things are your things.
String.Dest: 我的就是你的.

String.Source: We should find somewhere warm to camp tonight. Although easier said than done. But I suppose we always find a way to keep ourselves warm.
String.Dest: 我们今晚应该找一个温暖的地方安营扎寨。虽然说起来容易做起来难。但我想，我们总能找到一种保暖的方式。

String.Source: That day at Snowpoint Beacon, I almost called it quits. I thought my adventuring days were over. Now I can't see a day when I stop.
String.Dest: 在雪顶烽火台的那天，我几乎洗手不干了。我想我的冒险的日子结束了。而现在，我不知道什么时候自己才能停下来。

String.Source: Wherever we go, no matter how far we travel, it's always nice to come back home.
String.Dest: 无论我们走到哪里，不管旅行到多远，回家的时候总是很高兴。

String.Source: Ugh. Rain. This is just going to make the terrain more difficult.
String.Dest: 唉。雨。这只会让地形更加难走。

String.Source: You know what I like best about snow? It's not rain.
String.Dest: 你知道雪哪点让我最喜欢了么？那就是它不是雨。

String.Source: Every day I fight with a chip on my shoulder. Every time I see a guard wearing the uniform, I remember how they said I wasn't good enough to wear it.
String.Dest: 每一天我都带着肩膀上的裂口一起战斗。每一次我看到一个守卫穿着他的制服，我就会想起他们是怎样嘲笑我不够资格穿起那身衣服的。

String.Source: Some people prefer inns, but I've always loved to camp out outdoors. Nothing beats a warm fire, a bottle of mead, and a canvas of stars.
String.Dest: 有些人喜欢旅馆，但我独爱在外野营。还有什么能比一堆温暖的篝火，一杯蜜酒，一幕星辰更美妙呢？

String.Source: Be careful. Ice wraiths inhabit caves like this. Keep your eyes peeled and your ears perked.
String.Dest: 担心。寒冰怒灵一般呆在山洞里，就像现在这样。只要放亮眼睛，竖起耳朵就好。

String.Source: There's not too many things that can impress me. But making the climb up the 7000 steps? That's impressive.
String.Dest: 很少有什么事能让我赞叹的。不过要说爬上7000级台阶？真不可思议。

String.Source: This city is nice to look at, yet the ocean smells different here than in Dawnstar. It's saltier, and somehow...darker too.
String.Dest: 这城市看起来蛮漂亮，只是在这里大海的味道似乎与晨星城不同。味道更咸，而且更浓重。

String.Source: They say this town has been ravaged by Forsworn raids. It's sad to say, but there's so many wars going on, sometimes others take priority.
String.Dest: 他们说这个小镇已经被弃誓者劫掠袭击了。说起来真是悲哀，但无数战争仍在继续，有时候其他人会抢得先机。

String.Source: The thing I love about Skyrim is that every major city has its own personality. What I hate is that they never seem to change.
String.Dest: 我喜爱天际省的理由之一是每座大城市都有自己的个性。我讨厌世界大同。

String.Source: What do you think the folks back home in Dawnstar are doing right now? I'll bet you 10 gold pieces Karl is waving a flagon.
String.Dest: 你知道回到晨星城的人们现在在做什么？我敢拿十个金币来打赌，卡尔正拿着个酒壶在晃。

String.Source: Solitude is too big for someone like me. There's too many places to get lost, and I damn sure wouldn't be able to find anything.
String.Dest: 独孤城对于我这种人来说太大了，地点太多太容易迷路，我特么能确定的唯一一件事就是我什么都找不到。

String.Source: Bastard!
String.Dest: 魂淡！

String.Source: Maybe it's my boots. These don't seem like they have decent grip.
String.Dest: 也许这是我的鞋子。它们可不像看起来的那样能刚好抓地。

String.Source: What's happened to the Dark Elves is regrettable, but the way they segregate the Argonians by the dock is a travesty.
String.Dest: 这个黑暗精灵身上发生的事太可悲了，但他们通过码头想把亚龙人分开的方法真是滑稽。

String.Source: Oh boy, don't ask me to help you mine. You don't want to see me wield a pickaxe, and I don't want to make you laugh.
String.Dest: 嚯，别让我下矿帮你。你不想看见我挥镐的，而我也不想惹你发笑。

String.Source: So many brave warriors lay in this field. We should remember their sacrifice.
String.Dest: 许多无畏的战士都在这片土地沉睡。我们应该永远铭记他们的牺牲。

String.Source: The people of Dawnstar and Morthal used to have a sibling rivalry going. Now, Morthal is almost a ghost town. It's a shame.
String.Dest: 晨星城和墨索尔城的同胞们曾经互相竞争。现在，墨索尔城几乎已经变成了一座鬼城。真是羞愧。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: I still remember how Skald the Elder looked at me like I belonged in a kitchen. I'm no chamber maid. I'm a warrior.
String.Dest: 我还记得“长老”斯高德看我的眼神就好像在看厨房的火工。我不是一个女佣。我是一个战士。

String.Source: I do everything awkward. I fight awkward, I run awkward, I even sleep awkward. So I apologize in advance for the snoring.
String.Dest: 啥事儿到了我手里都尴尬异常。我战斗的时候尴尬，跑路的时候尴尬，甚至连睡觉也会搞出岔子。按这个尿性来看我睡觉铁定得打呼噜，先提前说声对不住啦。

String.Source: Dwemer machines don't seem all that flexible, but they're as nimble as a cat. I wonder if there's something I can learn from the way they move.
String.Dest: 锻莫的机器不都那么灵活，但它们却像猫一样敏捷。我在想，自己能不能从它们的移动方式中学会什么事呢。

String.Source: I had a nightmare last night. Sahlene...marked in blood. It had the shape of a human hand.
String.Dest: 昨晚我做恶梦了。索伦她...浑身都是血。有个人手中拿着把刀子。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: Don't worry about me in a fight. My swing may be a little unconventional, but it generates a lot of power.
String.Dest: 打起来的时候用不着担心我。我转的时候也许看起来不是那么正常，但是威力十足。

String.Source: Everyone here is so glum...but I suppose it isn't exclusive to Windhelm. There's nothing in this world that somebody doesn't hate.
String.Dest: 这的人都太闷闷不乐了……不过我觉得不只是风舵城这样。这世界上就没有什么不被人所憎恶的东西。

String.Source: Everyone dies. It's just more fun when we're the ones who kill them.
String.Dest: 所有人都死了，我们杀了他们只会让事情变得更有趣。

String.Source: Everyone dies. It's just more fun when we're the ones who kill them.
String.Dest: 所有人都死了，我们杀了他们只会让事情变得更有趣。

String.Source: Everyone dies. It's just more fun when we're the ones who kill them.
String.Dest: 所有人都死了，我们杀了他们只会让事情变得更有趣。

String.Source: Outside of the obvious reasons, how do sparring matches and real fights differ?
String.Dest: 除了那些显而易见的愿因，练习赛和真正的战斗的区别是什么？

String.Source: Outside of the obvious reasons, how do sparring matches and real fights differ?
String.Dest: 除了那些显而易见的愿因，练习赛和真正的战斗的区别是什么？

String.Source: Outside of the obvious reasons, how do sparring matches and real fights differ?
String.Dest: 除了那些显而易见的愿因，练习赛和真正的战斗的区别是什么？

String.Source: What sort of fights did you get into as a guard?
String.Dest: 做为一名护卫，你曾经卷入什么样的战斗？

String.Source: What sort of fights did you get into as a guard?
String.Dest: 做为一名护卫，你曾经卷入什么样的战斗？

String.Source: When did you get your first taste of real battle?
String.Dest: 你第一次品嚐到真正的戰鬥是在什麼時候？

String.Source: When did you get your first taste of real battle?
String.Dest: 你第一次品嚐到真正的戰鬥是在什麼時候？

String.Source: When did you get your first taste of real battle?
String.Dest: 你第一次品嚐到真正的戰鬥是在什麼時候？

String.Dest: 你第一次品嚐到真正的戰鬥是在什麼時候？

String.Dest: 你第一次品嚐到真正的戰鬥是在什麼時候？

String.Dest: 你第一次品嚐到真正的戰鬥是在什麼時候？

String.Dest: 你第一次品嚐到真正的戰鬥是在什麼時候？

String.Source: When did you get your first taste of real battle?
String.Dest: 你第一次品嚐到真正的戰鬥是在什麼時候？

String.Source: The ones who died deserved it, either by wickedness or foolishness.
String.Dest: 凡是死掉的都是活该，除了坏死的就是笨死的。

String.Source: The ones who died deserved it, either by wickedness or foolishness.
String.Dest: 凡是死掉的都是活该，除了坏死的就是笨死的。

String.Source: The ones who died deserved it, either by wickedness or foolishness.
String.Dest: 凡是死掉的都是活该，除了坏死的就是笨死的。

String.Source: More would have died had Deneris been allowed to live.
String.Dest: 如果让 Deneris 活下来，更多人会死去。

String.Source: More would have died had Deneris been allowed to live.
String.Dest: 如果让 Deneris 活下来，更多人会死去。

String.Source: Why didn't you stop her?
String.Dest: 你为什么不阻止她？

String.Source: Why didn't you stop her?
String.Dest: 你为什么不阻止她？

String.Source: Why didn't you stop her?
String.Dest: 你为什么不阻止她？

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: Skeletons. You were surrounded by skeletons.
String.Dest: 骷髅。你被骷髅包围了。

String.Source: Skeletons. You were surrounded by skeletons.
String.Dest: 骷髅。你被骷髅包围了。

String.Source: Skeletons. You were surrounded by skeletons.
String.Dest: 骷髅。你被骷髅包围了。

String.Source: How did you fend them off?
String.Dest: 你是怎么把他们打发走的？

String.Source: How did you fend them off?
String.Dest: 你是怎么把他们打发走的？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: This isn't about Deneris. You're thinking about Sahlene.
String.Dest: 这不关 Deneris 的事，你脑子里想的是 Sahlene.

String.Source: This isn't about Deneris. You're thinking about Sahlene.
String.Dest: 这不关 Deneris 的事，你脑子里想的是 Sahlene.

String.Source: This isn't about Deneris. You're thinking about Sahlene.
String.Dest: 这不关 Deneris 的事，你脑子里想的是 Sahlene.

String.Source: Being a bounty hunter is a lot different than guard duty.
String.Dest: 做个赏金猎人跟卫兵什么的差别大去了。

String.Source: Being a bounty hunter is a lot different than guard duty.
String.Dest: 做个赏金猎人跟卫兵什么的差别大去了。

String.Source: Being a bounty hunter is a lot different than guard duty.
String.Dest: 做个赏金猎人跟卫兵什么的差别大去了。

String.Source: Being a bounty hunter is a lot different than guard duty.
String.Dest: 做个赏金猎人跟卫兵什么的差别大去了。

String.Source: Being a bounty hunter is a lot different than guard duty.
String.Dest: 做个赏金猎人跟卫兵什么的差别大去了。

String.Source: Being a bounty hunter is a lot different than guard duty.
String.Dest: 做个赏金猎人跟卫兵什么的差别大去了。

String.Source: Being a bounty hunter is a lot different than guard duty.
String.Dest: 做个赏金猎人跟卫兵什么的差别大去了。

String.Source: Sahlene used to say that someday I'd surpass her as a fighter. That I fought so awkwardly my movements were unpredictable.
String.Dest: 索伦以前说总有一天我会超越她成为一名斗士. 因为我开打时笨拙的动作总是令人琢磨不透。

String.Source: Now come on, let's get out of here.
String.Dest: 现在过来, 一块儿离开这里.

String.Source: I looked to Talos for guidance. He granted my faith with a vision. A tiny red dot dancing around the altar.
String.Dest: 我向塔洛斯寻求引导，我看到一个红色的微小东西在祭坛周围舞蹈着，他就以这样的景象坚定了我的信念。

String.Source: After all, this day is about you. Deneris is dead, as our his nightblades. You are a true hero, and I can only hope to one day be the same.
String.Dest: 毕竟, 这是属于你的一天. 丹尼瑞斯已经死了, 作为我们的夜刃。你是一个真正的英雄, 我真期望自己有一天能和你一样.

String.Source: This is it. Deneris is here. Get ready.
String.Dest: 就是这样。丹尼勒斯在这里。做好准备。

String.Source: You fight recklessly when the blades are blunted. What's a blow to the arm if you can knock a man to the ground?
String.Dest: 当武器钝了的时候你的攻击就迟缓了。如果你要击倒一个人的话，攻击武器试试怎么样？

String.Source: Once the mystery was gone, they were nothing more than slaughterfish, wading through the air as I stuck them with my blade.
String.Dest: 当神话逝去，这边除了那些在水中游来游去，还被我的刀砍着的食人鱼没别的了。

String.Source: I threw the blood in the direction of the noise, hoping to splatter it across their glassy spines. Then I opened my eyes, and there they were.
String.Dest: 我将血扔向噪音所传来的方向，希望能让血溅在它们那玻璃般的脊柱上。而后我睁开我的双眼， 它们就在那里。[不清楚是不是在跟冰霜怒灵打]

String.Source: But that night, at that moment I wasn't that person I was going to be. I was who I was. And that person was weak.
String.Dest: 可在那天晚上，那个瞬间的我完全不是我想成为的样子。我是以前的我。是那个弱小的人。

String.Source: Only when I arrived I found no Thalmor. All was silent save for the crunch of my boots against the quilt of snow.
String.Dest: 而当我到了那儿却一个梭默也没发现。四周寂静得只能听见我的鞋踩在雪地上的吱吱声。

String.Source: But I suppose the Sahlene I knew died long ago, and it's her memory I honor when I fight by your side.
String.Dest: 可我以为我认识的那个索伦很早以前就去世了，当我和你并肩战斗时都是在表达对她的尊敬。

String.Source: As the stones form a wreath around a Shrine of Talos, many suspected the Thalmor. Few were brave enough to challenge them.
String.Dest: 当那堆石头堵在塔洛斯祭坛周围的时候，很多人怀疑是那个梭默干的。毕竟没多少人够胆儿去挑战他们。

String.Source: Your life ends now, Deneris!
String.Dest: 去死吧，丹尼勒斯！

String.Source: People won those tournaments by turning them into melees. Old fashioned brawls.
String.Dest: 他们用混战的方法赢下这个比赛，就像老式的争吵一样。

String.Source: I shook them off, and darted back behind a stone. It felt as if the wind itself was trying to take a bite out of my neck.
String.Dest: 我摆脱了他们，躲到了石头后面。就像风自己在撕咬我的脖子

String.Source: That's why we work well together. You're my conscience, and I'm yours. Now come on, let's go. This place is freezing.
String.Dest: 这就是为什么我们合作的亲密无间。你是我的良心，我也是你的。来吧，咱走着。这个地方太冷了。

String.Source: Is it that obvious? Sometimes I think I was better off not seeing her again.
String.Dest: 有那么明显吗？有时我就在想最好不要再见到她。

String.Source: We used to clean out the barracks and hold sparring matches. Tourneys. Put half a week's wages in a pot, winner take all.
String.Dest: 我们过去经常清理营房举行拳击比赛。那种锦标赛。我们把半个月的工资放在一个盆子里，打赢了的全部拿走。

String.Source: I know. Bounty hunters put their lives on the line almost every day, and only reap from the blood they sow.
String.Dest: 我知道，赏金猎人每天都是命悬一线，他们就靠他们整出的血过日子。

String.Source: But so many have died, I wonder if we were better off never getting involved.
String.Dest: 但是这么多人都死了，我怀疑如果我们没有牵扯进来是不是更好。

String.Source: Only they did so without a body, and without a tongue. They were ice wraiths.
String.Dest: 只有他们才能不用手脚和口舌就能做到。他们是冰怨灵。

String.Source: But we're alive, and Deneris isn't, and that's something worth celebrating. Come on, let's get out of this place and grab ourselves a drink.
String.Dest: 可我们还活着，而 Deneris 死了，这就够值得庆幸了。来吧，我们快离开这里找点喝的去。

String.Source: It was a drop of blood. And just like that I had my answer. With but one health potion left, I would only have one chance. I tossed my shield away.
String.Dest: 这是一滴血。就这样，我得到了我的答案。带着这瓶仅剩的生命药水，我只有一次机会。于是我丢掉了我的盾牌。

String.Source: I slashed my palm and squeezed it, letting the blood collect in my hand. Then I closed my eyes and listened for the rattle to get close.
String.Dest: 我砍我的掌心，挤压它，让血液积攒在我的手里。然后，我闭上了眼睛，听着咔哒咔哒的声音逐渐靠近。

String.Source: I drew my sword, when I should've raised my shield. I still recall the feeling of frostbite that touched my skin as their fangs sunk into my flesh.
String.Dest: 当我应该举起我的盾牌的时候，我抽回了我的剑。我还记得冻伤触摸着我的皮肤，把它们的毒牙插进我的​​血肉时的感觉。

String.Source: Real fights, I imagined they'd be different. I knew they'd be different. It was just a question of how much.
String.Dest: 真正的战斗，我想是不太一样吧。肯定是不一样的。问题只不过是差别有多少而已。

String.Source: Just in case, I knelt before the altar like a pilgrim, and asked for Talos' blessing. That's when I heard it. The chattering of teeth.
String.Dest: 【就在那时】我像个朝圣者一样拜倒在祭坛前，祈求塔洛斯的祝福。接着就听见那声音，牙齿打颤的声音。

String.Source: When I was a guard, I'd gotten in hundreds of battles, fights, and scuffles, but never with my life on the line.
String.Dest: 在我做守卫的时候，我曾打过数百场战役，争斗和混战，但从未命悬一线。

String.Source: Mentally, physically, and emotionally. Sahlene told me to wait outside. And I was more than happy too.
String.Dest: 精神上，身体上，和感情上。索伦让我待在外面。而我很乐意这么做。

String.Source: Curse you, nightblade!
String.Dest: 夜莺，我诅咒你！

String.Source: You may have a lust for blood, but I that's not why I fight by your side. You always do what's right.
String.Dest: 你或许是有些嗜血，但这并不是我与你并肩作战的原因。（真正的原因是）你总是做正确的事。

String.Source: You're as good as dead!
String.Dest: 你死定了！

String.Source: It was a sound that slithered and swam through the air, rattling like a pair of bone snakes.
String.Dest: 一声响蜿蜒游过天边，像极了一条骨蛇。

String.Source: The Jarl had put up a bounty after word came of pilgrims dying near the Weynon Stones.
String.Dest: 领主在听到了那些谣言后曾悬赏求证， 据说朝圣者们会在维农宝石附近慢慢死去。

String.Source: By Ysmir, you'll pay for that!
String.Dest: 伊斯米尔在上，你会为此付出代价的!

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: We'd knock each other around with practice swords until our bodies were as lumpy as a toad. I won more than my share. Of lumps and gold.
String.Dest: 我们互相敲打来练习我们的剑术直到我们的身体笨重的像个蛤蟆一样。我赢得了比我分享的东西更多的回报。块煤和金子。

String.Source: That doesn't sound like a safe place for children.
String.Dest: 对于孩子们来说这地方听起来可不安全。

String.Source: That doesn't sound like a safe place for children.
String.Dest: 对于孩子们来说这地方听起来可不安全。

String.Source: If you were strong enough, the Jarl would choose you regardless.
String.Dest: 如果你有足够的实力，领主会选择不管你。

String.Source: If you were strong enough, the Jarl would choose you regardless.
String.Dest: 如果你有足够的实力，领主会选择不管你。

String.Source: If you were strong enough, the Jarl would choose you regardless.
String.Dest: 如果你有足够的实力，领主会选择不管你。

String.Source: If you were strong enough, the Jarl would choose you regardless.
String.Dest: 如果你有足够的实力，领主会选择不管你。

String.Source: Siblings fight. Spouses fight. Particularly if one of them is Beitild.
String.Dest: 兄弟姐妹之间会打来打去，夫妻之间也会打来打去，特别是他们中的一人是贝提尤德的话。

String.Source: Siblings fight. Spouses fight. Particularly if one of them is Beitild.
String.Dest: 兄弟姐妹之间会打来打去，夫妻之间也会打来打去，特别是他们中的一人是贝提尤德的话。

String.Source: Siblings fight. Spouses fight. Particularly if one of them is Beitild.
String.Dest: 兄弟姐妹之间会打来打去，夫妻之间也会打来打去，特别是他们中的一人是贝提尤德的话。

String.Source: Siblings fight. Spouses fight. Particularly if one of them is Beitild.
String.Dest: 兄弟姐妹之间会打来打去，夫妻之间也会打来打去，特别是他们中的一人是贝提尤德的话。

String.Source: That does sound rather embarrassing. And pathetic. Then what happened?
String.Dest: 听起来确实很尴尬也挺可悲的。接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: That does sound rather embarrassing. And pathetic. Then what happened?
String.Dest: 听起来确实很尴尬也挺可悲的。接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: That does sound rather embarrassing. And pathetic. Then what happened?
String.Dest: 听起来确实很尴尬也挺可悲的。接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: You mentioned you were not without some talent.
String.Dest: 你提到过没有某些天赋的话你啥都不是。

String.Source: You mentioned you were not without some talent.
String.Dest: 你提到过没有某些天赋的话你啥都不是。

String.Source: You mentioned you were not without some talent.
String.Dest: 你提到过没有某些天赋的话你啥都不是。

String.Source: You mentioned you were not without some talent.
String.Dest: 你提到过没有某些天赋的话你啥都不是。

String.Source: I'd be honored if you fought by my side.
String.Dest: 如果你愿意跟我并肩作战，那会是我的荣幸。.

String.Source: The chattering teeth of a Thalmor Justicar.
String.Dest: 来自于一个梭默审判者的不停打颤的牙齿。

String.Source: The chattering teeth of a Thalmor Justicar.
String.Dest: 来自于一个梭默审判者的不停打颤的牙齿。

String.Source: The chattering teeth of a Thalmor Justicar.
String.Dest: 来自于一个梭默审判者的不停打颤的牙齿。

String.Source: Technically, Deneris was already dead. Now he's goo.
String.Dest: 从技术上讲，Deneris已经翘辫子了。 他已归西去了

String.Source: Technically, Deneris was already dead. Now he's goo.
String.Dest: 从技术上讲，Deneris已经翘辫子了。 他已归西去了

String.Source: Technically, Deneris was already dead. Now he's goo.
String.Dest: 从技术上讲，Deneris已经翘辫子了。 他已归西去了

String.Source: Sounds like a great man, and a good housecarl.
String.Dest: 听起来是个不错的家伙，也是个不错的侍卫.

String.Source: Sounds like a great man, and a good housecarl.
String.Dest: 听起来是个不错的家伙，也是个不错的侍卫.

String.Source: Sounds like a great man, and a good housecarl.
String.Dest: 听起来是个不错的家伙，也是个不错的侍卫.

String.Source: Sounds like a great man, and a good housecarl.
String.Dest: 听起来是个不错的家伙，也是个不错的侍卫.

String.Source: Housecarls die. Jarls change. Your time may yet come.
String.Dest: 侍卫们死了，领主被取代了。属于你的时代或许要到来了。

String.Source: What did you expect? Those who challenge me never see tomorrow.
String.Dest: 你以为会怎样？挑战我的人从来活不到第二天。

String.Source: What did you expect? Those who challenge me never see tomorrow.
String.Dest: 你以为会怎样？挑战我的人从来活不到第二天。

String.Source: What did you expect? Those who challenge me never see tomorrow.
String.Dest: 你以为会怎样？挑战我的人从来活不到第二天。

String.Source: Dead as deathbells. Where's Sahlene?
String.Dest: 丧钟敲响时，就有人死了。索伦在哪？

String.Source: Dead as deathbells. Where's Sahlene?
String.Dest: 丧钟敲响时，就有人死了。索伦在哪？

String.Source: Dead as deathbells. Where's Sahlene?
String.Dest: 丧钟敲响时，就有人死了。索伦在哪？

String.Source: In the heat of battle, things happen. What happened after you tripped?
String.Dest: 在激烈的战斗中一定发生了什么，你在绊倒后怎么了?

String.Source: In the heat of battle, things happen. What happened after you tripped?
String.Dest: 在激烈的战斗中一定发生了什么，你在绊倒后怎么了?

String.Source: In the heat of battle, things happen. What happened after you tripped?
String.Dest: 在激烈的战斗中一定发生了什么，你在绊倒后怎么了?

String.Source: Hence there was no way you could replace him.
String.Dest: 所以你根本没可能取代他的位置。

String.Source: Hence there was no way you could replace him.
String.Dest: 所以你根本没可能取代他的位置。

String.Source: Hence there was no way you could replace him.
String.Dest: 所以你根本没可能取代他的位置。

String.Source: Hence there was no way you could replace him.
String.Dest: 所以你根本没可能取代他的位置。

String.Source: Such feelings will pass. Your place is here in the home.
String.Dest: 这样的情绪会过去的。你的归宿应该是在这里，在家里。

String.Source: Such feelings will pass. Your place is here in the home.
String.Dest: 这样的情绪会过去的。你的归宿应该是在这里，在家里。

String.Source: Such feelings will pass. Your place is here in the home.
String.Dest: 这样的情绪会过去的。你的归宿应该是在这里，在家里。

String.Source: Well, try not to get yourself killed on the way back.
String.Dest: 好吧，一定要想办法活着回来哦。

String.Source: He's gone, or so I hope. How are you feeling?
String.Dest: 他走了，希望如此。你感觉如何？

String.Source: He's gone, or so I hope. How are you feeling?
String.Dest: 他走了，希望如此。你感觉如何？

String.Source: He's gone, or so I hope. How are you feeling?
String.Dest: 他走了，希望如此。你感觉如何？

String.Source: She asked me if I wanted to come, but I told her...my place is here, with the people of Skyrim, and with you.
String.Dest: 她问我是否愿意过去，但我告诉她……我的家在这儿，我和天际的人们在一起，和你在一起。

String.Source: She asked me if I wanted to come, but I told her...my place is here, with the people of Skyrim, and with you.
String.Dest: 她问我是否愿意过去，但我告诉她……我的家在这儿，我和天际的人们在一起，和你在一起。

String.Source: Hey, it may be hard to believe given what just happened, but I'm a warrior. A talented one. Someday I'll prove it to you.
String.Dest: 嘿，你可能很难相信刚刚发生了什么，但我是一个战士，一个有才能的人。总有一天我会证明给你看的。

String.Source: As a result, he's revered and loved by the people, the guards, and more importantly, the Jarl himself. A true hero of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 最后，他被人们尊敬和爱戴，其中包括守卫，甚至领主。他是天际省的一个真正的英雄.

String.Source: Only they did so without a body, and without a tongue. They were ice wraiths.
String.Dest: 没有身体，没有舌头，他们只能这么做。他们是冰怨灵.

String.Source: Maybe that's why Skald decided to put a stop to all the talk. He told the guard captain to get rid of me. Said there was a hole in my defense.
String.Dest: 也许这就是为什么斯加德决定停止了所有的谈论. 他告诉守卫队长撵走我 。 告诉他在那里我的防御有一个漏洞.

String.Source: Maybe that's why Skald decided to put a stop to all the talk. He told the guard captain to get rid of me. Said there was a hole in my defense.
String.Dest: 也许这就是为什么斯加德决定停止了所有的谈论. 他告诉守卫队长撵走我 。 告诉他在那里我的防御有一个漏洞.

String.Source: Maybe that's why Skald decided to put a stop to all the talk. He told the guard captain to get rid of me. Said there was a hole in my defense.
String.Dest: 也许这就是为什么斯加德决定停止了所有的谈论. 他告诉守卫队长撵走我 。 告诉他在那里我的防御有一个漏洞.

String.Source: But she'll need all her strength for the voyage south. I pray to the Divines she'll find her parents alive and safe.
String.Dest: 但她会极尽全力往南方去。我祈求九圣灵保佑她的父母安然无恙。

String.Source: The sad thing is, if we fought in an empty room, I could slay a dozen of these jesters, as clean and easy as the snow in Frostfall.
String.Dest: 不幸的是，如果我们在一间空屋子里战斗的话，我能像霜落月的雪那样干净利落地做掉一打像这样的小丑。

String.Source: The sad thing is, if we fought in an empty room, I could slay a dozen of these jesters, as clean and easy as the snow in Frostfall.
String.Dest: 不幸的是，如果我们在一间空屋子里战斗的话，我能像霜落月的雪那样干净利落地做掉一打像这样的小丑。

String.Source: Even if I failed to kill them quickly, I thought if I just stayed aggressive, I could keep them off balance and just push them over the edge.
String.Dest: 即使我不能速战速决做掉他们，我不停进攻的话就能让他们进退失据直到没有回天之力。

String.Source: I'm ready for the next fight. Just say the word. It's too bad Sahlene won't be joining us.
String.Dest: 我准备好了。就能你发话了。索伦没加入我们真遗憾啊。

String.Source: No, not quite. I've heard a Thalmor make plenty of strange noises, mostly in death, but none like an angry bone chime.
String.Dest: 不,，不完全如此。我听说梭默制造了几起骚乱，大多都是屠杀，但没有像一个愤怒的骨钟那样。

String.Source: Jod was part of a naval garrison that fought off the Thalmor as their ships attempted to establish a beachhead on the northern coast.
String.Dest: 在梭莫将他们的船靠在北海岸，试图建立一个滩头阵地之时，一个海军部队将他们击退了。而Job正是部队中的一份子。

String.Source: Sahlene almost laughed when I asked her if she wanted to spar before she left, just for old times sake.
String.Dest: 在我问索伦她是否想要在离开之前因为一些老掉牙的理由吵一架时，她差点笑出来。

String.Source: She left, by the way. She wanted to find her parents. But I made her promise this time, not to wait so long before coming back.
String.Dest: 顺便说句，她走了。她要去找她父母。但我让她保证，这次别那么久才回来了。

String.Source: She said she wanted to look for her parents. She thinks they might've gone back to Elsweyr, or maybe even Hammerfell to help out with the war.
String.Dest: 她说想去找自己的父母。她认为他们可能回到 Elsweyr 了，甚至也可能回去落锤省去助战。

String.Source: She said she wanted to look for her parents. She thinks they might've gone back to Elsweyr, or maybe even Hammerfell to help out with the war.
String.Dest: 她说想去找自己的父母。她认为他们可能回到 Elsweyr 了，甚至也可能回去落锤省去助战。

String.Source: I don't know if it's my place. I'm a trained fighter, and I'd say I've adventured as much as you have.
String.Dest: 我不知道这是不是我的地盘儿。我是一个训练有素的战士，而且我经历的冒险和你一样多。

String.Source: I know one thing, people would've hated me for it. We all want to think our heroes are infallible.
String.Dest: 我只知道一点，人们不能因此记恨于我。我们都希望我们的英雄战无不胜。

String.Source: I know one thing, people would've hated me for it. We all want to think our heroes are infallible.
String.Dest: 我只知道一点，人们不能因此记恨于我。我们都希望我们的英雄战无不胜。

String.Source: I know one thing, people would've hated me for it. We all want to think our heroes are infallible.
String.Dest: 我只知道一点，人们不能因此记恨于我。我们都希望我们的英雄战无不胜。

String.Source: Oh, it's you again. Thank you for earlier. I'd appreciate if you kept some of the more...embarrassing details to yourself.
String.Dest: 哦，又是你。之前谢谢你了。如果你能把一些更……尴尬的细节烂在肚子里，我会很感激的。

String.Source: Except I know I'm a better fighter than Jod. He may have been a great warrior in his time, but now he gets by on reputation and myth.
String.Dest: 除非我知道我是个比Jod更优秀的战士。也许他在他年轻的时候是一位伟大的战士，但现在他只靠往昔的名誉和神话过活。

String.Source: Except I know I'm a better fighter than Jod. He may have been a great warrior in his time, but now he gets by on reputation and myth.
String.Dest: 除非我知道我是个比Jod更优秀的战士。也许他在他年轻的时候是一位伟大的战士，但现在他只靠往昔的名誉和神话过活。

String.Source: Except I know I'm a better fighter than Jod. He may have been a great warrior in his time, but now he gets by on reputation and myth.
String.Dest: 除非我知道我是个比Jod更优秀的战士。也许他在他年轻的时候是一位伟大的战士，但现在他只靠往昔的名誉和神话过活。

String.Source: That's true. Although one of these days I'd like to take a crack at it. Just a practice duel, of course, nothing serious.
String.Dest: 这是真的。但总有一天我想试试。只是一次决斗练习罢了，当然，没什么大不了的。

String.Source: If anything that's the reason I should be here. I need to slow down a bit. Recover so my body is ready for the next great adventure.
String.Dest: 如果有合适的理由我会呆在这里的。现在我需要放慢速度，养精蓄锐让我的身体为下场大冒险做好准备I。

String.Source: For a tough miner like Leigelf, maybe that isn't love, but it's close enough.
String.Dest: 对一个像雷杰尔弗这样坚强的矿工来说，那可能不是爱情, 但这也差不多了.

String.Source: But the position was filled by a man named Jod, a great warrior and former Imperial legionnaire.
String.Dest: 但是那个位置被一个叫Jod的人给占了，他是个出色的战士，曾经参加过帝国军团。

String.Source: When I was younger, I trained in the barracks as a sword-maiden. Many believed I would eventually serve Skald the Elder as his housecarl.
String.Dest: 我年轻的时候，我在兵营作为一个剑侍女受训。许多人认为我最终会侍奉Skald长老成为他的侍卫。

String.Source: She hopped on the first boat headed south. But it was easier this time, because it wasn't really a goodbye.
String.Dest: 她跳上了第一艘南下的船。但这一次更容易，因为它不是一个真正的告别。

String.Source: Thank you, my love. Just be sure to catch me if, no, when I stumble.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，亲爱的。如果，不，当我跌倒了，请记得扶我一把。

String.Source: You should slow down too. I don't care how many healing potions or spells you have, there's only so much a body can take.
String.Dest: 你也应该放轻松。我不管你身上带着多少治疗药水或是有多少种治愈魔法可以去使用，你只有一个身体，身体垮了的话可就没有替换的啦。

String.Source: Well, that was embarrassing. Brought to the ground by a couple of weak little bandits.
String.Dest: 嗯，那真是尴尬。被一撮弱爆了的小强盗击倒在地。

String.Source: But that makes it sound like my sister was a frost troll. She wasn't perfect, she wasn't even decent.
String.Dest: 但这听起来就好像我的姐妹是个丛林巨魔一样，她不完美，甚至她都不能算正经人。

String.Source: That's exactly why Sahlene went in. She was stubborn that way. Loved a challenge. She went into caves all the time, and she always came back.
String.Dest: 这完全就是为什么Sahlene加入进来.他就是喜欢做这种事. 喜欢去挑战. 他总是去山洞，而且总能安全回来.

String.Source: But people who work and live the hard way, they're worthy of your respect.
String.Dest: 但是艰苦奋斗挣扎求生的人，总是值得你尊敬的。

String.Source: I even had a plan too. I was going to charge in and catch them off guard. Take all the thinking out of it.
String.Dest: 我甚至都有了个计划。只要向守卫指控，等到守卫们抓捕他们，就可以让他们把想法全盘托出了。

String.Source: It was a sound that slithered and swam through the air, rattling like a pair of bone snakes.
String.Dest: 一声响蜿蜒游过天边，像极了一条骨蛇。

String.Source: Only I was the one who lost my balance. I tripped on the stairs on the way up. Just another instance of me being awkward. Story of my life.
String.Dest: 我才是唯一没平衡感的人。我就是连上楼梯都能摔跤的。 这只是我众多狼狈故事中的一个。我真实的生活写照。

String.Source: You're back. Is Deneris dead?
String.Dest: 你回来了. Deneris死了么?

String.Source: And while I realize there's something almost cruel about slaying a man's reputation, sometimes it is the only way.
String.Dest: 我意识到毁坏一个人的名誉几近冷酷, 有时那是唯一的办法.

String.Source: And while I realize there's something almost cruel about slaying a man's reputation, sometimes it is the only way.
String.Dest: 我意识到毁坏一个人的名誉几近冷酷, 有时那是唯一的办法.

String.Source: And while I realize there's something almost cruel about slaying a man's reputation, sometimes it is the only way.
String.Dest: 我意识到毁坏一个人的名誉几近冷酷, 有时那是唯一的办法.

String.Source: I suppose you're right. But dead or alive, he was dangerous. And now, as you say, his body matches his heart. The man really was a piece of slime.
String.Dest: 我想你对了。但不管是死的是活的，他都很危险。正如你说的，他的身体和他的心脏融合了。他真的是一摊黏液。

String.Source: Thank you again.
String.Dest: 再次感谢你。

String.Source: Do you get bored staying at home?
String.Dest: 你在家呆烦了吗？

String.Source: Do you get bored staying at home?
String.Dest: 你在家呆烦了吗？

String.Source: Do you get bored staying at home?
String.Dest: 你在家呆烦了吗？

String.Source: Do you get bored staying at home?
String.Dest: 你在家呆烦了吗？

String.Source: Do you get bored staying at home?
String.Dest: 你在家呆烦了吗？

String.Source: Do you get bored staying at home?
String.Dest: 你在家呆烦了吗？

String.Source: You should be ashamed of yourself for talking about your sister that way.
String.Dest: 你应该为你那样谈论你的姐姐感到羞耻。

String.Source: Tell me about your day.
String.Dest: 有什么有趣的消息和传言吗？

String.Source: Tell me about your day.
String.Dest: 有什么有趣的消息和传言吗？

String.Source: Tell me about your day.
String.Dest: 有什么有趣的消息和传言吗？

String.Source: Tell me about your day.
String.Dest: 有什么有趣的消息和传言吗？

String.Source: You should've called a guard. An adult, anyone.
String.Dest: 你应该叫守卫、成年人什么的人。

String.Source: You should've called a guard. An adult, anyone.
String.Dest: 你应该叫守卫、成年人什么的人。

String.Source: You should've called a guard. An adult, anyone.
String.Dest: 你应该叫守卫、成年人什么的人。

String.Source: Why is your face colored the way it is?
String.Dest: 为何你要把你的脸画成這副德行?

String.Source: Why is your face colored the way it is?
String.Dest: 为何你要把你的脸画成這副德行?

String.Source: Why is your face colored the way it is?
String.Dest: 为何你要把你的脸画成這副德行?

String.Source: Are you alright?
String.Dest: 你没事吧？

String.Source: Are you alright?
String.Dest: 你没事吧？

String.Source: Are you alright?
String.Dest: 你没事吧？

String.Source: Ice wraiths.
String.Dest: 冰霜怨灵。

String.Source: Ice wraiths.
String.Dest: 冰霜怨灵。

String.Source: I can escort you to Dawnstar.
String.Dest: 我可以护送你去晨星城。

String.Source: I can escort you to Dawnstar.
String.Dest: 我可以护送你去晨星城。

String.Source: You need to pay attention to your surroundings.
String.Dest: 你得留意周围。

String.Source: How so?
String.Dest: 怎么了？

String.Source: How so?
String.Dest: 怎么了？

String.Source: How so?
String.Dest: 怎么了？

String.Source: How so?
String.Dest: 怎么了？

String.Source: Breezehome seems to be suiting you well.
String.Dest: Breezehome 应该很适合你。

String.Source: In any case, I don't need your thanks, but I want your gold. How about a reward?
String.Dest: 无论如何，我不需要你的感谢而是金子，来点酬劳怎么样？

String.Source: So, how are things in Riften?
String.Dest: 那么，裂谷城那边情况怎样？

String.Source: So, how are things in Riften?
String.Dest: 那么，裂谷城那边情况怎样？

String.Source: Housecarls die. Jarls change. Your time may yet come.
String.Dest: 侍卫们死了，领主被取代了。属于你的时代或许要到来了。

String.Source: Housecarls die. Jarls change. Your time may yet come.
String.Dest: 侍卫们死了，领主被取代了。属于你的时代或许要到来了。

String.Source: Children can be cruel.
String.Dest: 孩子也能冷酷无情。

String.Source: Children can be cruel.
String.Dest: 孩子也能冷酷无情。

String.Source: Were you always an awkward fighter?
String.Dest: 你作为战士总是那么笨手笨脚吗？

String.Source: Were you always an awkward fighter?
String.Dest: 你作为战士总是那么笨手笨脚吗？

String.Source: Were you always an awkward fighter?
String.Dest: 你作为战士总是那么笨手笨脚吗？

String.Source: What do you think of Hjerim?
String.Dest: 你对霜齋怎么看？

String.Source: What do you think of Hjerim?
String.Dest: 你对霜齋怎么看？

String.Source: What do you think of Hjerim?
String.Dest: 你对霜齋怎么看？

String.Source: No one believed you?
String.Dest: 没人信你吗？

String.Source: No one believed you?
String.Dest: 没人信你吗？

String.Source: No one believed you?
String.Dest: 没人信你吗？

String.Source: Young children are wont to misbehave. It's nothing personal.
String.Dest: 年轻孩子喜欢干坏事。这和个体无关。

String.Source: Young children are wont to misbehave. It's nothing personal.
String.Dest: 年轻孩子喜欢干坏事。这和个体无关。

String.Source: How do you like Markarth?
String.Dest: 你觉得马卡斯城如何?

String.Source: How do you like Markarth?
String.Dest: 你觉得马卡斯城如何?

String.Source: How's the store faring?
String.Dest: 商店盈利如何？

String.Source: How's the store faring?
String.Dest: 商店盈利如何？

String.Source: How's the store faring?
String.Dest: 商店盈利如何？

String.Source: How's the store faring?
String.Dest: 商店盈利如何？

String.Source: Sure. Just stay behind me and don't get in my way.
String.Dest: 当然，只要你跟在后面，别挡我路就行。

String.Source: Sure. Just stay behind me and don't get in my way.
String.Dest: 当然，只要你跟在后面，别挡我路就行。

String.Source: Sure. Just stay behind me and don't get in my way.
String.Dest: 当然，只要你跟在后面，别挡我路就行。

String.Source: I'll hear water dripping into a bucket and I'll think back to some hollow cave.
String.Dest: 我听到水滴落到木桶里的声音，然后回想起一些中空的洞穴。

String.Source: Only I saw nothing save the noise, and the bending of light, as they slithered and swirled around me, without a body, and without a tongue.
String.Dest: 除了噪音和光的扭曲以外我什么都没听见也没看见，它们就好像翻转回旋在我的周围，没有实体，也没有语言。

String.Source: Of course. Beitild liked to say when I came out of the womb I looked like a spider, all knees and elbows.
String.Dest: 当然，贝提尤德总喜欢说我出生的时候就像一只大蜘蛛，只能看见膝盖和手肘。

String.Source: Yes, it reminds me of my sister's. If I do have one criticism, it's the location. Whiterun's too far removed from the ocean. It smells like grass.
String.Dest: 是的，这让我想起了我的姐妹。如果要说有什么不满意的话，地理位置算一个。白漫城离海太远了，风中都是青草的味道。

String.Source: There was a new bard at the inn in Dragon Bridge. Sang a tune I've only heard one other person sing. The 'Wolves of Jorrvaskr.'
String.Dest: 龙桥的酒馆来了一位新的吟游诗人。他演唱的那首“月瓦斯卡之狼群”我只从别处听过一次。

String.Source: I was negotiating a deal with the Khajiit caravans, when I met one of the young females in their camp.
String.Dest: 我是在和虎人商队谈判一项协议时,在他们的营地遇到一个年轻的女性。

String.Source: Oh, that. I was trying on war paint the other day. You know, just to see how it looked.
String.Dest: 噢，那个。那是有一天我试着画战痕。其实就是想看看效果。

String.Source: I'll be in the market and hear a passerby humming some old tune, and it'll take me back to some musky tavern, and a bard who couldn't carry one.
String.Dest: 我将呆在集市里，听路人哼一曲老调。这会使我想起那飘香的酒馆以及不会这样唱歌的诗人。

String.Source: I know. But Sahlene insisted the second we told anyone, we'd never be allowed inside. And I believed her when she said she'd be back soon.
String.Dest: 我知道。但是我们是不会被允许进入的。索伦已经两次如此坚持的对我们每个人说了，不过她说她会马上回来，我相信她。

String.Source: Hell, people say I'm one of the most promising warriors to come from The Pale in a long time. Someday, I'll prove all of them right.
String.Dest: 该死，在很长一段时间里，人们都说我是来自的灰白领的最有前途的战士之一。总有一天我会证明他们是对的。

String.Source: I've seen too much of the world to want to be cooped up in a Longhouse, listening to nobles and farmers petition the Jarl for lower taxes.
String.Dest: 我见过太多事情需要在长屋里解决的，听贵族讲话，农民们请求领主降低税率。

String.Source: Bored isn't the right word. I'm perfectly satisfied with a quiet life, and have no reason to complain about it.
String.Dest: 无聊这个词并不恰当。我非常满意于一个清静的生活，没有理由抱怨。

String.Source: It's been a long time since I've seen her or my brother-in-law. Maybe it's time to stop adventuring and come back home.
String.Dest: 我已经很久没见过她跟我【妹夫】了。也许是时候结束冒险回家休息啦。

String.Source: I admit though, there are times when I do get a bit nostalgic.
String.Dest: 不过我承认，有那么几次我是有点怀旧来着。

String.Source: Are you alright?
String.Dest: 你还好吧？

String.Source: Are you alright?
String.Dest: 你还好吧？

String.Source: Are you alright?
String.Dest: 你还好吧？

String.Source: What I'm saying is, you've got a point, although you shouldn't jab people so hard with it. But it might be time I take a break from adventuring.
String.Dest: 我要说的是，虽然你不该强迫别人接受你的观点，但你确实说的对。也许我现在应该暂停冒险，休息休息。

String.Source: You sound like my sister Beitild. She was a real bitch.
String.Dest: 你的话听起来像我的妹妹贝提尤德。她是个真正的婊子

String.Source: People who are willing to tell the truth, when it's ugly and mean and naked on a fork, they usually are.
String.Dest: 当他们的丑陋、卑鄙赤裸裸地展现在风尖浪口上时，他们当中又有谁愿意说出真相呢。

String.Source: That Temple of Dibella creeps me out. What is it exactly that the sisters do when they commune behind closed doors?
String.Dest: 我战战兢兢的从迪贝拉神殿爬了出来。这就是那帮修女关起房门后的真正作为？

String.Source: Oh, you can help too. There's plenty of walls to fill, although the back one is mine. We'll display your spoils off to the side.
String.Dest: 哦，你也可以帮忙啊。还有一堆的【房间walls】要等着去被填满呢。虽然后面的那个是我的。我们可以给你展示一下隔壁的战利品。

String.Source: Don't worry, you'll be happy to know your wife handled herself appropriately.
String.Dest: 别担心。在你知道你妻子很好地把持着自己的时候你会很高兴的。

String.Source: When she didn't return, I told Sahlene's parents what happened. Her father waited for days outside that door, slamming his fists against the stone.
String.Dest: 那时他并没有给我答复，我告诉Sahlene的父母发生了什么。他的父亲有好几天在家门外，用他的拳头猛砸石头发泄。

String.Source: I helped the guards kill a thief today! Well, sort of. I helped corner him, but they stuck him with their arrows.
String.Dest: 今天我帮守卫杀了个小偷！好吧，只是帮了小忙。我帮助守卫把他逼到角落，但他们用箭让他无法动弹。

String.Source: I'll think of the lighthouse standing watch over the Sea of Ghosts, welcoming me home.
String.Dest: 我觉得灯塔的看守者眺望着远方的幽灵之海，欢迎着我回归故乡。

String.Source: That's good advice, but hard to take when there's so much of it. The surroundings. Can't keep track of it all and concentrate on my opponent.
String.Dest: 这提议不错，但现在这里有这么多的这玩意儿，在这环境下很难去做到啊。我不能在记住它的同时专注于我的对手。

String.Source: Not even my sister came to my defense. Only one person ever did. Her name was Sahlene.
String.Dest: 甚至我的姐妹都不来为我辩解，只有一个人那么做了，她的名字叫索伦。

String.Source: As well as can be expected. And by that I mean, given I have no merchant experience, it's not going very well.
String.Dest: 真是不出我所料。我是说，我没什么当商人的经验，进展得很不顺利。

String.Source: Yes, I know, but she doesn't make it easy. Bad relatives are almost like a prison sentence, and the only crime you've committed was being born.
String.Dest: 是啊，我知道，但她那是活该。糟糕的亲戚关系就像无期徒刑一样，而你唯一的罪孽就是投错了胎。

String.Source: As a bounty hunter, I can still serve the hold and the Jarl while traveling across The Pale, and honor the spirits to whom I've pledged my sword.
String.Dest: 作为一个赏金猎人，我在穿越苍白领地时也能为领地和领主服务，并且荣耀那些我以此剑起誓的灵魂。

String.Source: You make it sound like I'd be a hindrance. I'm not entirely convinced I can't take you in a fight.
String.Dest: 你说得我好像就是个障碍。我对我无法在战斗中对付你这种观点并不完全认同！

String.Source: And yes, I do remember how we met. But I'll have you know if it wasn't for that accursed step, I would've taken care of the bandits myself.
String.Dest: 是的，我确实记得我们见面的情形。不过我得让你知道，如果不是那些该死的事，我才不会亲自照顾一个强盗。

String.Source: She was slick, clever, mischievous and mysterious. Her family hailed from Elsweyr, and she smelled of sand and blood.
String.Dest: 她聪明，灵巧，淘气而又神秘。她的家族来自埃斯沃拉省，她身上带着沙子和血的味道。

String.Source: The house is decorative too, especially the second floor. I look forward to filling all the racks and trophy cases.
String.Dest: 这房子也基本上就是个装饰作用，尤其是二楼。我实在等不及想要把那些架子和战利品箱什么的全都塞得满满的了。

String.Source: Beautiful song, but the bard himself was a bit crass. Although I suppose it's my own fault for stumbling into his arms.
String.Dest: 歌曲很动听，但吟遊诗人本身却有点粗鲁。虽然我琢磨着失脚绊倒在他怀里是我自己的错。

String.Source: I know it won't help our business, but I couldn't bear it. Those eyes...they took me to a dark place.
String.Dest: 我知道这对我们的事儿没啥益处，但我实在忍不住了。那些眼睛..它们让我陷入黑暗之中。

String.Source: It just happened to be the brightest and hottest day of the year.
String.Dest: 这将会是这一年中最屌的一天！

String.Source: When I complained to the adults, they almost did the same. Jorn, was a sweet, innocent boy, they said.
String.Dest: 当我向大人抱怨的时候，他们做的事都差不多。乔恩，是个可爱的，天真无邪的男孩儿，他们说。

String.Source: When I complained to the adults, they almost did the same. Jorn, was a sweet, innocent boy, they said.
String.Dest: 当我向大人抱怨的时候，他们做的事都差不多。乔恩，是个可爱的，天真无邪的男孩儿，他们说。

String.Source: I was gangly child. My arms and legs seemed in a hurry to grow and left the rest of my body behind. It didn't help that I was shy.
String.Dest: 我小时候很廋。我的手脚似乎长的太快把身体其他部分都远远抛在后面了。这对我当时害羞的毛病一点帮助都没有。

String.Source: That they were, like two bone snakes rattling their icy scales as they swam through the air.
String.Dest: 它们在那儿，好像两条骨蛇在空气中游过的时候浑身冰一样的鳞片咔咔作响。

String.Source: She was a real slaughterfish, my sister. People who are willing to tell the truth, when it's cold and hard and naked on a fork, they usually are.
String.Dest: 我的姐妹，她真是一条食人鱼。 人们通常如此，当你又冷又困难又赤裸裸地被钉在一个叉子上时，又有谁会说出真相！

String.Source: Must've been some sort of conjurer's trick, the way it jumped right up and tripped me.
String.Dest: 肯定是某种巫师的鬼把戏，像这样猛地跳出来让我栽个跟头什么的。

String.Source: He never blamed me though, no matter how much his wife said I deserved it. He told me it wasn't my fault. I was just a child.
String.Dest: 不过他从没有责备过我，无论她的妻子怎么跟他说我罪有应得。他告诉我这不是我的错。我只是一个孩子。

String.Source: When Jorn first met her, I think his jaw would've hit the floor if she hadn't thrust it up his nose. She didn't buy his sweet boy act for a second.
String.Dest: Jorn 第一次跟她见面的时候，惊得长大了嘴完全不知所措。【可她丝毫不为所动】。

String.Source: Maybe a fisherman will carry the ocean on his tunic, or the fire from the smith's forge will burn like hot magma, and I'll be reminded of Dawnstar.
String.Dest: 也许是渔夫的要带上携带着大海的气息，又或是铁匠的熔炉中烈火如滚滚的熔岩，我总会联想到晨星城

String.Source: In any case, I didn't like the paint, but when I took it off...well, if you're going to laugh, go ahead. But I didn't do it on purpose.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说我不喜欢那个战纹，可是我想洗掉的时候……啊，如果你忍不住的话就尽管笑好了。可是我真不是故意的。

String.Source: I'll be fine. If there's one thing I can handle it's a beating. My sister Beitild always said I was tougher than a mammoth, and half as smart.
String.Dest: 我会没事的。如果有什么我能做的话，就是打败它。我的姐姐贝提尤德总说我比长毛象更加强壮，却只有它一半儿聪明。

String.Source: The village children were merciless. Tikrid the Awkward, they used to chant, like it was some nursery rhyme.
String.Dest: 村里的孩子们十分残忍。他们总是编唱一些类似童谣的东西搞得惕克瑞德尴尬万分。

String.Source: I just need a couple hours to get my stamina back. I know it's hard to believe given what happened, but I'm a strong fighter.
String.Dest: 没错，我只需要几小时恢复我的耐力。我知道很难相信发生了什么，但我仍是个强大的战士。

String.Source: I apologized for the accident, and when he insisted it wasn't an accident, I accidentally punched him in the face.
String.Dest: 我为这次意外道歉，当他坚持说那不是个意外，我以外的打了他的脸。

String.Source: I know, but there was one child in particular, Jorn, who took things a step further. He used to climb on the rooftops and hurl stones at me.
String.Dest: 我知道，但是有个孩子很特殊，办事总是先人一步，名字叫乔恩。他总是爬到屋顶上朝我扔石头。

String.Source: Especially that Jolene...the things she says out in public would make a Draugr blush.
String.Dest: 尤其是那个乔伦娜……她在公共场合里说的那些个话尸鬼听了都脸红。

String.Source: About your sister...
String.Dest: 关于你的姐妹...

String.Source: About your sister...
String.Dest: 关于你的姐妹...

String.Source: How does it feel to be adventuring again?
String.Dest: 再次探险感觉怎么样？

String.Source: Do you blame yourself for what happened to Sahlene?
String.Dest: 对于 Sahlene发生的事情，你又自责吗?

String.Source: Do you blame yourself for what happened to Sahlene?
String.Dest: 对于 Sahlene发生的事情，你又自责吗?

String.Source: Do you blame yourself for what happened to Sahlene?
String.Dest: 对于 Sahlene发生的事情，你又自责吗?

String.Source: It's possible the advice was true. You simply failed to heed it.
String.Dest: 那建議或許是對的也說不定，只是你没有留意它罢了。

String.Source: It's possible the advice was true. You simply failed to heed it.
String.Dest: 那建議或許是對的也說不定，只是你没有留意它罢了。

String.Source: It's possible the advice was true. You simply failed to heed it.
String.Dest: 那建議或許是對的也說不定，只是你没有留意它罢了。

String.Source: It's possible the advice was true. You simply failed to heed it.
String.Dest: 那建議或許是對的也說不定，只是你没有留意它罢了。

String.Source: How's it feel to be back home?
String.Dest: 回家的感觉如何？

String.Source: How's it feel to be back home?
String.Dest: 回家的感觉如何？

String.Source: How's it feel to be back home?
String.Dest: 回家的感觉如何？

String.Dest: 回家的感觉如何？

String.Dest: 回家的感觉如何？

String.Source: How's it feel to be back home?
String.Dest: 回家的感觉如何？

String.Source: How's it feel to be back home?
String.Dest: 回家的感觉如何？

String.Source: About your sister...she's dead.
String.Dest: 你妹妹...死了。

String.Source: About your sister...she's dead.
String.Dest: 你妹妹...死了。

String.Source: About your sister...she's dead.
String.Dest: 你妹妹...死了。

String.Source: How did what happened to Sahlene change you?
String.Dest: 发生在索伦身上的事情是怎样改变你的?

String.Source: How did what happened to Sahlene change you?
String.Dest: 发生在索伦身上的事情是怎样改变你的?

String.Source: How did what happened to Sahlene change you?
String.Dest: 发生在索伦身上的事情是怎样改变你的?

String.Source: It seems Beitild's former husband own
String.Dest: 似乎归贝提尤德的前夫所有

String.Source: It seems Beitild's former husband own
String.Dest: 似乎归贝提尤德的前夫所有

String.Source: It seems Beitild's former husband own
String.Dest: 似乎归贝提尤德的前夫所有

String.Source: Why do you think she taught you?
String.Dest: 为什么认为是她训练得你？

String.Source: Why do you think she taught you?
String.Dest: 为什么认为是她训练得你？

String.Source: Why do you think she taught you?
String.Dest: 为什么认为是她训练得你？

String.Source: I don't mind if you come with, so long as you don't neglect your other duties.
String.Dest: 我不介意你一起來，只要你不要忽略了你的职责。

String.Source: I don't mind if you come with, so long as you don't neglect your other duties.
String.Dest: 我不介意你一起來，只要你不要忽略了你的职责。

String.Source: In any case, I don't need your thanks, but I want your gold. How about a reward?
String.Dest: 无论如何，我不需要你的感谢而是金子，来点酬劳怎么样？

String.Source: Just as Jorn's innocence was an illusion, so is life's.
String.Dest: 就像 Jorn的无辜是虚幻的, 生命也是。

String.Source: Did you manage to find the sword?
String.Dest: 你找到那把剑了吗？

String.Source: Did you manage to find the sword?
String.Dest: 你找到那把剑了吗？

String.Source: Did you manage to find the sword?
String.Dest: 你找到那把剑了吗？

String.Source: So what's stopping you?
String.Dest: 是谁在阻止你？

String.Source: So what's stopping you?
String.Dest: 是谁在阻止你？

String.Source: Dressed like that, it's no wonder you were cold.
String.Dest: 穿成那样，怪不得会冷了。

String.Source: Dressed like that, it's no wonder you were cold.
String.Dest: 穿成那样，怪不得会冷了。

String.Source: Dressed like that, it's no wonder you were cold.
String.Dest: 穿成那样，怪不得会冷了。

String.Source: You and Sahlene must have been fast friends.
String.Dest: 你和索伦一定是好朋友。

String.Source: You and Sahlene must have been fast friends.
String.Dest: 你和索伦一定是好朋友。

String.Source: You and Sahlene must have been fast friends.
String.Dest: 你和索伦一定是好朋友。
