String.Source: You and Sahlene must have been fast friends.
String.Dest: 你和索伦一定是好朋友。

String.Source: You and Sahlene must have been fast friends.
String.Dest: 你和索伦一定是好朋友。

String.Source: So you fell. But a good warrior never lets go of their weapon.
String.Dest: 这么说你败了。可是一个好战士是绝不会松开他的武器的。

String.Source: So you fell. But a good warrior never lets go of their weapon.
String.Dest: 这么说你败了。可是一个好战士是绝不会松开他的武器的。

String.Source: So you fell. But a good warrior never lets go of their weapon.
String.Dest: 这么说你败了。可是一个好战士是绝不会松开他的武器的。

String.Source: Someone wants her dead.
String.Dest: 有人想要她死。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: How did you react to the divorce?
String.Dest: 你对那次离婚反应如何？

String.Source: How did you react to the divorce?
String.Dest: 你对那次离婚反应如何？

String.Source: How did you react to the divorce?
String.Dest: 你对那次离婚反应如何？

String.Source: I...I can't say I'm surprised. It's sad to say, but my sister made enemies like bees make honey, and she stung worse than any swarm.
String.Dest: 我...我只能说习以为常。很遗憾，我妹妹到处惹事生非, 经常捅出大篓子。

String.Source: It...it asked her a question. Sahlene talked back to it, but the door didn't like her answers.
String.Dest: 它...它问她一个问题. 索伦回复了, 但那道门并不满意她的回复.

String.Source: I know. But it slid out of my hand, off the ledge and into the bed of snow below. Sahlene told me not to panic, even though I was already starting t
String.Dest: 我知道。可它从我手中滑脱了，从山脊掉落到下面的积雪里。Sahlene让我不要慌，可我当场就……

String.Source: Yes. In fact, it only took me a few minutes to find the sword standing straight up in the snow. I called to Sahlene, but she didn't answer.
String.Dest: 是的。事实上，我只花了几分钟时间就找到了那把直直扎在雪地中的剑。我赶紧喊索伦，但她没有回话。

String.Source: Well, it's not exactly the same thing. For one, this is my first time traveling with a companion.
String.Dest: 嗯,并不是完全相同的事情。首先,这是我第一次和同伴一起旅行。

String.Source: We spent every minute together. Her father was grooming her to be a warrior, and she'd often share the lessons she learned.
String.Dest: 我们从不分开。她的父亲把她培养成了一个战士，而她则经常将那些训练与我分享。

String.Source: It slid out of my hand, off the ledge and into the bed of snow below. Sahlene told me not to panic, even though I was already starting to.
String.Dest: 可它从我手中滑脱了，从山脊掉落到下面的积雪里。索伦让我不要慌，可我当场就……

String.Source: To serve the hold and honor those whose spirits I fight for.
String.Dest: 我为这精神和荣誉而战。

String.Source: As for the city, it's just like I remembered. There's a few new faces in town, but that's not a bad thing.
String.Dest: 对城市来说，就像我记得的那样。镇上有几张新的面孔，但这并不是一件坏事。

String.Source: No defense is perfect. Even the most skilled fighter knows that every missed blow is an opening for your opponent.
String.Dest: 没有防御是完美的。即使是最熟练的战士都知道，每一个落空的攻击在他们的对手来看都是破绽。

String.Source: She was staring at something, a dark surface wedged in the rock. I ran over and tugged at her shoulder, holding up the hilt to her eyes.
String.Dest: 她盯着什么东西，【那东西卡在一块儿石头的暗面里。】我跑过去拽了一下她的肩膀，拿刀柄在她眼前晃了晃。

String.Source: It would've been even worse knowing that she'd always have the last word. Her roof, her rules. With her gone, I'm almost relieved.
String.Dest: 知道她有最终决定权之后我更痛苦了。各种规章、制度。她走了之后我轻松好多。

String.Source: But I'm in a little light in the pocket since I stopped hunting bounties. Sad thing is I'm dependent on my sister to survive.
String.Dest: 但自从我不干赏金猎人之后，我的钱袋就空空如也了。真是可悲啊！我得依靠着我的妹妹才能生存下去了。

String.Source: She gripes over the slightest of things, and turns them into biggest of arguments. It got so bad I was thinking of moving into the Windpeak Inn.
String.Dest: 她总是为一些鸡毛蒜皮的小事大发雷霆。我实在受不鸟了，于是考虑搬去风岳旅店住.

String.Source: Dealing with Beitild death's...I can't say it was a shock, but it's different from other losses I've experienced.
String.Dest: 关于贝提尤德的死...这对我来说倒也不是个晴天霹雳，但这确实与我曾经经历过的一些生离死别有些不同。

String.Source: She never turned her gaze. That's when I looked at the rock once more, and saw the door. A black one, painted with skulls and bones. And it spoke.
String.Dest: 她一直没有移开她的目光。于是我再次望向那块岩石，然后看到了那扇门。黑色的门，上面画着骷髅和骨头。然后它说话了。

String.Source: My body is the vessel for both our spirits, one chasing a dream, and the other vowing to never let a friend chase it alone.
String.Dest: 我的身体里装着我们俩的灵魂，一个追逐梦想，而另一个则发誓永远陪伴。

String.Source: We met at night, and practiced by the lighthouse fire. She taught me how to hold a weapon, how to strike with it, and how to defend.
String.Dest: 我们在晚上见面，然后在灯塔上的火旁练习。她教我怎样握武器，怎样攻击和防御。

String.Source: If I learned to protect myself, she said, bullies like Jorn could never get away with hurting me again.
String.Dest: 她说如果我学会保护自己，那么像Jorn这种恶霸就再也不会欺负我了。

String.Source: From down below the fire from the lighthouse was dim, but bright enough to reflect any stray metal lying in that the pillow of white.
String.Dest: 那亮光在灯塔的火焰下看来确实是暗，但是已经足以让【那白色枕头】里的任何【丢失的金属】反射出光泽。

String.Source: From down below the fire from the lighthouse was dim, but bright enough to reflect any stray metal lying in that the pillow of white.
String.Dest: 那亮光在灯塔的火焰下看来确实是暗，但是已经足以让【那白色枕头】里的任何【丢失的金属】反射出光泽。

String.Source: But I respected her strength all the same.
String.Dest: 但是我同样尊重她的实力。

String.Source: Dealing with Beitild on a daily basis, now I remember why I enjoyed leaving this place.
String.Dest: 每天跟贝提尤德打交道，现在终于想起来为什么我以前总想离开这地方。

String.Source: The divorce wasn't much of surprise, considering. They were never really friendly with each other. Passionate, maybe but that's not enough.
String.Dest: 细想起来，他们俩离婚不是那么出乎意料。他们向来相敬如宾，但似乎有欠激情。

String.Source: I said something. I can't recall what. But the door opened and...she went in.
String.Dest: 我的确说了些什么。但是我不记得了，但是这个门开了……而且她走进去了。

String.Source: In the end, it wasn't my path to walk. So I had to find another way to get where I needed to go.
String.Dest: 到头才发现，这条道路与我的意愿相左，因故欲遂己愿，我需改弦更张。

String.Source: I'm not a great cook as far as housewives are concerned, but out on the road, I can roast a piece of wild game better than any city chef.
String.Dest: 考虑到有家庭主妇的参与，我不是一个优秀的厨师，但是在野外，我的烧烤水平远胜任何一个城镇大厨！

String.Source: She was always thinking about others, trying to shield us all from harm. She was strong, gallant, and honorable. She was my friend.
String.Dest: 她总是为别人着想，总试着保护我们大家不受任何伤害。她强健，英勇而又正直。她是我的好友。

String.Source: Then I'd welcome him to the guild. There's no shortage of miners, relatives, ex-husbands, and Jarls who want to see her head on a pike.
String.Dest: 于是我们对他的入会表示了欢迎。这儿的所有人，那些矿工们，家属们，前夫们和领主们，对她无一不是欲啖其肉饮其血而解心头之恨。

String.Source: Well, the store is more of a hobby more than anything. It's hard to really expand without owning a shop or a stall.
String.Dest: 这样说吧，开商店更多的是我个人的喜好。要是没有一个店面或者货摊的话，要发展起来挺难的。

String.Source: So I swore to myself that I would become the person Sahlene always thought I could be, and achieve the goals she always wanted for herself.
String.Dest: 所以我对我自己发誓一定要成为Sahlene一直认为我可以成为的那种人，并且去实现她一直她自己能够实现的那些目标。

String.Source: That scrap ain't good for much save patching up Elven armor, and if that's your business here, you may find yourself with a shortage of customers.
String.Dest: 那些废料对于修补精灵甲而言数量完全不够，如果那就是你要做的生意，恐怕你会发现你没有几个客人上门。

String.Source: But my speed is deceptive. To my opponent my sword moves as swift as the wind, and my shield is as light as a cloud.
String.Dest: 但是说我速度快那是胡扯，要我说我的剑轻的挥起来就像风，我的盾拿着就和拿着天上的浮云一样。

String.Source: Only they did so without a body, and without a tongue. They were ice wraiths.
String.Dest: 只有他们才能不用手脚和口舌就能做到。他们是冰怨灵。

String.Source: To be honest, I was dreading the arguments we'd inevitably have the moment I stepped into her home.
String.Dest: 老实说，我害怕的是当我走进她家的同时就不得不遭遇一场骂战。

String.Source: She's the kind of woman who chews rocks for fun and cleans her dishes with spit. Cross her and you're not doing yourself any favors.
String.Dest: 她是那种没事嚼石子当糖吃，吐口水洗碟子的女人。【跟她过不去】的话你就别想有好日子过了。

String.Source: It was only a matter of time before things got messy. And my sister's not someone you want to mess with.
String.Dest: 事情变得棘手只是时间问题了。而且我【姐姐】也不是那种容易招惹的家伙。

String.Source: Yes, I blame myself, and I always will. Not for opening that door, but for lacking the courage to follow her inside it.
String.Dest: 是的，我不停地内疚，我也该内疚。我会内疚倒不是因为我打开了门，而是因为我居然没有足够的勇气跟着她一起进去。

String.Source: You might be right. But it does me little good to know it now. She never made it out of there. Whatever was inside, it swallowed her whole.
String.Dest: 也许你是对的。但现在知道它对我而言没有半点好处。她永远也出不来了。里面的东西，会把她整个人吞噬干净的。

String.Source: If they just gave me a chance. Then I would've shown them.
String.Dest: 如果他们只给我一个机会。那我会告诉他们。

String.Source: I know I look awkward in battle. It might look like I've never swung a sword, or my shield is too heavy for my arm.
String.Dest: 我知道我在战斗中看上去很笨拙。就像一个从未挥过剑，或者根本拿不动盾牌的人。

String.Source: I already had one mother, and I have no need for another. And it was not my teeth that were chattering.
String.Dest: 我已经有一个妈妈了，用不着第二个。而且刚才并不是我的牙齿在打颤。

String.Source: And it burns me every single day that I couldn't be the same for her.
String.Dest: 每当我想起我无法像她对待我们一样对待她时，我就寝食难安。

String.Source: It was a sound that slithered and swam through the air, rattling like a pair of bone snakes.
String.Dest: 一声响蜿蜒游过天边，像极了一条骨蛇。

String.Source: I was mortified. Couldn't even breathe. I backed up, tripped, and fell on my bottom, clutching my blade like a doll. Sahlene didn't flinch.
String.Dest: 我窘迫不安。甚至连喘口气也不能。我后退，我摔倒，我掉到了人生的底部，紧紧地握着刀，如同僵硬的人偶。索伦没有畏缩。

String.Source: Although I do feel guilty for thinking that way.
String.Dest: 即使这么想让我很内疚。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: If I ever met the person, I don't know if I'd punch him or thank him. Beitild was kin, but she wasn't kind. Not even to me. Especially not to me.
String.Dest: 如果我见到那人, 真不知道应该揍他还是谢他. 贝缇尤德跟我们亲戚, 但她并不和善。 甚至跟我也是。尤其是跟我。

String.Source: We ran down to the shoreline and combed the area.
String.Dest: 我们沿着海岸线把那个区域仔细地搜查了一遍。

String.Source: We ran down to the shoreline and combed the area.
String.Dest: 我们沿着海岸线把那个区域仔细地搜查了一遍。

String.Source: Krillo has a lead on the black market contracts.
String.Dest: Krillo 掌管着黑市的条款。

String.Source: A thank you would suffice.
String.Dest: 道声谢就足够了。.

String.Source: A thank you would suffice.
String.Dest: 道声谢就足够了。.

String.Source: A thank you would suffice.
String.Dest: 道声谢就足够了。.

String.Source: Let's go.
String.Dest: 走吧。

String.Source: I don't like it either love, but we don't have a choice.
String.Dest: 我不喜欢也不爱它，但我们没有选择。

String.Source: I don't like it either love, but we don't have a choice.
String.Dest: 我不喜欢也不爱它，但我们没有选择。

String.Source: This one-eyed man could be a suspect. What else do you know?
String.Dest: 这个独眼男人可能是嫌疑人。你還知道什麼吗？

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: What about you?
String.Dest: 你怎么样?

String.Source: Yes, you should stay as far away as possible.
String.Dest: 是的，你应该呆得越远越好。

String.Source: Yes, you should stay as far away as possible.
String.Dest: 是的，你应该呆得越远越好。

String.Source: Nasrin has my trust. I'm still not sure about you.
String.Dest: 我信任Nasrin . 而我仍然不太信任你。

String.Source: Nasrin has my trust. I'm still not sure about you.
String.Dest: 我信任Nasrin . 而我仍然不太信任你。

String.Source: Nasrin has my trust. I'm still not sure about you.
String.Dest: 我信任Nasrin . 而我仍然不太信任你。

String.Source: I know how to shadow a man, Tikrid.
String.Dest: 我知道如何遮蔽一个人，Tikrid。

String.Source: I know how to shadow a man, Tikrid.
String.Dest: 我知道如何遮蔽一个人，Tikrid。

String.Source: Where do you think I should watch him?
String.Dest: 你觉得我该去哪里看他？

String.Source: Where do you think I should watch him?
String.Dest: 你觉得我该去哪里看他？

String.Source: What should I do if I spot the assassin?
String.Dest: 我发现了刺客该怎么办？

String.Source: What should I do if I spot the assassin?
String.Dest: 我发现了刺客该怎么办？

String.Source: I don't like it either, but we don't have a choice.
String.Dest: 我也不喜欢它，但我们别无选择。

String.Source: I don't like it either, but we don't have a choice.
String.Dest: 我也不喜欢它，但我们别无选择。

String.Source: Someone wants her dead.
String.Dest: 有人想要她死。

String.Source: Wouldn't ten o' clock be a bit early in the day for an assassin to strike?
String.Dest: 10点钟对于刺客的行动而言是不是太早了？

String.Source: Wouldn't ten o' clock be a bit early in the day for an assassin to strike?
String.Dest: 10点钟对于刺客的行动而言是不是太早了？

String.Source: Wouldn't ten o' clock be a bit early in the day for an assassin to strike?
String.Dest: 10点钟对于刺客的行动而言是不是太早了？

String.Source: Did you always suspect she was alive?
String.Dest: 这么说你一直怀疑她还活着？

String.Source: Did you always suspect she was alive?
String.Dest: 这么说你一直怀疑她还活着？

String.Source: You think she doubled back to the city?
String.Dest: 你认为她原路返回了城里？

String.Source: You think she doubled back to the city?
String.Dest: 你认为她原路返回了城里？

String.Source: You heard him. Three names. Once we have all three, he's a rug.
String.Dest: 你听说过他。还有那三个名字。一旦我们把那三个聚集全咯，他就是张毛毯了。

String.Source: You heard him. Three names. Once we have all three, he's a rug.
String.Dest: 你听说过他。还有那三个名字。一旦我们把那三个聚集全咯，他就是张毛毯了。

String.Source: And fighters of this caliber tend to like a challenge. I know I would.
String.Dest: 而有这本事的选手都倾向于挑战。我知道我是会的。

String.Source: But if this person thinks it'll be easy killing my sister, well, her bite is as loud as her bark.
String.Dest: 但如果这个人认为可以轻易杀死我的姐妹，那可就得悲剧了，她那张“刀子嘴”咬起人来也不是盖的。

String.Source: We've stopped. What is it?
String.Dest: 我们停下了。那是什么？

String.Source: Now and forever.
String.Dest: 现在和永远。

String.Source: If you want, we can talk at length later, but first I want to get back to Dawnstar. I'll be staying at my sister Beitild's.
String.Dest: 再次谢谢你。如果你愿意,我们可以以后在谈,但首先我想回到晨星城。我会和我的妹妹Beitild住在一起的。

String.Source: In prosperity and poverty, joy and hardship, we are bound.
String.Dest: 富足或贫困，幸福或艰辛。这些是我们注定要面对的。

String.Source: I won't let you down.
String.Dest: 我不会让你倒下的。

String.Source: Not much, I'm afraid. I didn't notice him until the other day, when he walked into the Skeever posing as a beggar.
String.Dest: 恐怕不是很多。我隔天才看见他像个乞丐一样走进眨眼雪鼠。

String.Source: The enemy of my enemy...(sigh) My love, sometimes it's hard to tell what side we're fighting on.
String.Dest: 我的敌人的敌人……（叹）亲爱的，有时候真是搞不清我们到底站在哪一边。

String.Source: The enemy of my enemy...(sigh) Sometimes it's hard to tell what side we're fighting on.
String.Dest: 我的敌人的敌人……（叹）有时候真是搞不清我们到底站在哪一边。

String.Source: To the next fight.
String.Dest: 前往下个战场。

String.Source: Let's go.
String.Dest: 走吧。

String.Source: With you leading the way though, I can just trace your steps. Not to say there isn't a different kind of pressure.
String.Dest: 不过由你带路的话，我依然可以追随你的步伐。甚至可以说这么做毫无压力。

String.Source: You go back and check on Krillo. I...I want to stay here and look for her. I refuse to leave her behind again.
String.Dest: 你去找奎依罗。我……我想呆在这里找她。我不能再次丢下她。

String.Source: I know that. I-I just want to make sure we're on the same page.
String.Dest: 我知道，我只是想确认一下我们是否还在同一条船上。

String.Source: He could be lying, but at least we'll have saved a few of these nightblades first.
String.Dest: 他可能是在说谎，但至少我们能先救其中的一些夜莺。

String.Source: And don't get me started on bone chimes. You'd think there was a bard festival in town the way I made those things rattle.
String.Dest: 还有别碰那些骨质编钟，一旦我弄响了它们，你就想象着前面有个盛大的吟游诗人庆典在等着我们好了。

String.Source: When I explored an old ruin, I always had to keep one eye on the ground. Even then I was pretty much a trap trigger one day and rune bait the next.
String.Dest: 当我发现了一个老旧的废墟时，我总是小心翼翼的留意着地面。即便如此，一天我还是差点触发了陷阱和之后的符文。

String.Source: And if we're lucky, we might find out more about the person who put up this contract.
String.Dest: 如果我们运气足够好，我们甚至可能找到订下这个合约的人。

String.Source: Stop her, yell to the guard, anything. Although I think the old man was planning on taking her himself. You can't sneak up on a nightblade.
String.Dest: 阻止她，叫守卫，快做点儿什么。虽然我想那老人打算自己带她走。在一个夜莺面前潜行简直就是作大死。

String.Source: Still, if there's someone even more dangerous out there, we need to find her first.
String.Dest: 冷静点，如果那边有什么更危险的人存在，我们就先得找到她。

String.Source: No matter what, I've got your back.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，我会保护你的。

String.Source: Now's not the time to jest, love. There are people's lives at stake. (Sigh) But I guess that means we have no choice but to listen to his terms.
String.Dest: 现在没时间开玩笑，亲爱的。人们的生命正受到威胁。（叹息）我想这意味着除了听从他的条件外别无选择。

String.Source: I have to watch your back, and cover your front. If anything were to happen to you, it would be on me.
String.Dest: 我将守护您的身前身后。倘若有一支箭直指您的下身，我一定会先用膝盖接住它！

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: Hey, being sneaky is not my strong suit, but I'm a damn good melee fighter. And if this turns into one, you'll be happy I'm here to back you up.
String.Dest: 嘿，老子潜行可没点满啊！不过老子打起近战来连老子自己都害怕！如果呆会咱们陷入了一场混战，你就会庆幸你有老子帮忙。

String.Source: I think that's what makes the routine believable. Otherwise it'd be an obvious trap.
String.Dest: 我想那就是让这些日常作为令人信服的缘由了。或者说这明摆着就是个陷阱。

String.Source: I won't shed a tear for what she had coming. Sometimes a person has to settle their debts.
String.Dest: 我不会为她所发生的一切流出一滴眼泪。有时一个人必须处理自己埋下的苦果。

String.Source: I'm ready for whatever comes next.
String.Dest: 我已经做好应对一切的准备。

String.Source: If so, I want to find her. I don't want to leave her behind. But if she did double back, I need you to stop her from killing Krillo.
String.Dest: 如果如此的话，我想要找到她。我不想丢下她不管。但是如果她加倍奉还的话，我需要你阻止她杀掉Krillo。

String.Source: You look concerned. How can I help?
String.Dest: 你看起来忧心忡忡的。有什么我能帮忙的吗？

String.Source: If that were true, I don't know what she'd hate more, you killing her or saving me. Probably the killing part.
String.Dest: 如果那是真的，我不知道她更憎恶那个：你杀掉她，或者让我活着。或许是杀掉那个吧。

String.Source: I wouldn't have it any other way. Just so you know, if you ever need a sword, a shield, or a friend, I'm your woman.
String.Dest: 我不会采用任何其他方式。我只是想让你知道，如果你需要一把剑，一面盾牌，或是一个朋友的话，我都能帮你。

String.Source: Safe travels.
String.Dest: 旅途安全。

String.Source: If you need me, I'm with you.
String.Dest: 如果你需要，我就跟你走。

String.Source: Then you should check it out. If you need me, I won't abandon you. But I rather not leave this place until I know Sahlene is gone.
String.Dest: 那你就该确认一下。要是你需要我，我就不会离开你。不过在确认 Sahlene 走掉了之前我不想离开这儿。

String.Source: I never gave up hope. But I never thought she would end up like this.
String.Dest: 我从不放弃希望。但我没想到她会这样结束。

String.Source: In this life and the next.
String.Dest: 永生永世。

String.Source: You don't mean that. We're companions. This Khajiit is a murderer. But at least we know for certain he can't be trusted.
String.Dest: 你不会这么想的。我们是同伴。这个虎人则是个凶手。而至少我们确信他的话不足为信。

String.Source: But whenever I do feel nostalgic, I can always follow you on your adventures. If you'll have me.
String.Dest: 而一旦我想重温往日时光，我总能随你一道冒险。只要你愿意我傍你左右。

String.Source: Still, finding the murderer should be our next goal, and hopefully that will lead us to whoever contracted them.
String.Dest: 找到凶手应该是我们的下一个目标，希望那能让我们找到和他们订约的人。

String.Source: Still, finding the murderer should be our next goal, and hopefully that will lead us to whoever contracted them.
String.Dest: 找到凶手应该是我们的下一个目标，希望那能让我们找到和他们订约的人。

String.Source: I don't know...maybe it's another trick to get us to leave so she can escape.
String.Dest: 我不知道...也许又是一个调虎离山的骗局想把我们引开她好逃跑.

String.Source: It looks like there's a shaded area right in front of the Temple of Talos, and also the stairs going up to the second level. Either will do.
String.Dest: 似乎在塔罗斯神殿的签名是一片阴影区域，而楼梯也登上了第二节。两个都可以。

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 怎么了？

String.Source: In any case, if that's all settled, I'm going back to the inn to rest up for tomorrow. Hopefully this assassin will take the bait.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，如果就这么定了，我可回旅馆为明天养精蓄锐。希望那个刺客能中计。

String.Source: In any case, if that's all settled, I'm going back to the inn to rest up for tomorrow. Hopefully this assassin will take the bait.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，如果就这么定了，我可回旅馆为明天养精蓄锐。希望那个刺客能中计。

String.Source: In any case, if that's all settled, I'm going back to the inn to rest up for tomorrow. Hopefully this assassin will take the bait.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，如果就这么定了，我可回旅馆为明天养精蓄锐。希望那个刺客能中计。

String.Source: In any case, if that's all settled, I'm going back to the inn to rest up for tomorrow. Hopefully this assassin will take the bait.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，如果就这么定了，我可回旅馆为明天养精蓄锐。希望那个刺客能中计。

String.Source: In any case, if that's all settled, I'm going back to the inn to rest up for tomorrow. Hopefully this assassin will take the bait.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，如果就这么定了，我可回旅馆为明天养精蓄锐。希望那个刺客能中计。

String.Source: But I know every time I look back on her life, it'll be with a little more fondness.
String.Dest: 但是每次我回想她的回去，我都会更加喜爱她。

String.Source: Goodbye.
String.Dest: 再见。

String.Source: I want to search these ruins. If there's a chance she's still hiding here...I don't want to leave her behind again.
String.Dest: 我想搜索一下这片废墟。她依然有躲藏在这里的坑能行……我不想再抛弃她一次了。

String.Source: Where's Gancielo?
String.Dest: Gancielo在哪？

String.Source: Where's Gancielo?
String.Dest: Gancielo在哪？

String.Source: Deneris would have motive to kill his former brothers.
String.Dest: Deneris 可能有谋杀他哥哥们的动机.

String.Source: Deneris would have motive to kill his former brothers.
String.Dest: Deneris 可能有谋杀他哥哥们的动机.

String.Source: You mean Noster? He's lived here for some time. In fact, that's him over there.
String.Dest: 你指的是Noster？他在这生活有一段时间了。事实上，只有他在这。

String.Source: You mean Noster? He's lived here for some time. In fact, that's him over there.
String.Dest: 你指的是Noster？他在这生活有一段时间了。事实上，只有他在这。

String.Source: I have some other business to take care of. Meet me in Markarth.
String.Dest: 我还有些别的生意要照料。到Markarth去与我碰面吧。

String.Source: You heard the guards. They're taking care of it. Move along.
String.Dest: 卫兵们说了，一切由他们搞定。赶紧走开！

String.Source: You heard the guards. They're taking care of it. Move along.
String.Dest: 卫兵们说了，一切由他们搞定。赶紧走开！

String.Source: You heard the guards. They're taking care of it. Move along.
String.Dest: 卫兵们说了，一切由他们搞定。赶紧走开！

String.Source: This one-eyed man could be a suspect. What else do you know?
String.Dest: 这个独眼男人可能是嫌疑人。你還知道什麼吗？

String.Source: You mean Noster? He's already dead.
String.Dest: 你是说Noster的吗？他已经死了。

String.Source: A one-eyed man, Tikrid? Really?
String.Dest: 一个独眼龙，剃克瑞德? 真的吗？

String.Source: A one-eyed man, Tikrid? Really?
String.Dest: 一个独眼龙，剃克瑞德? 真的吗？

String.Source: I'm not following you. Black fingers? Are you saying I know this milk-drinker?
String.Dest: 我听不懂你在说什么。黑色手指？你是说我知道这个小屁孩？

String.Source: I'm not following you. Black fingers? Are you saying I know this milk-drinker?
String.Dest: 我听不懂你在说什么。黑色手指？你是说我知道这个小屁孩？

String.Source: I'm not following you. Black fingers? Are you saying I know this milk-drinker?
String.Dest: 我听不懂你在说什么。黑色手指？你是说我知道这个小屁孩？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: You've got some explaining to do, Nasrin. What are you doing here?
String.Dest: 你可得好好解释了，纳瑟琳。妳为什麽会在这裡？

String.Source: There she is! We've got her now!
String.Dest: 就在那儿！我们找到她了！

String.Source: Nasrin!
String.Dest: 纳瑟琳！

String.Source: If you think we're going to help an assassin, you're out of your mind!
String.Dest: 要是你想让我们帮助一名刺客，你就是疯了！

String.Source: I know you're worried, love, but I'll be fine. Go check on Krillo.
String.Dest: 我知道你很担心，吾爱。但我没事儿。去奎依罗看看吧。

String.Source: I just want to let you know, I don't like being out in the open like this.
String.Dest: 我只是想让你知道，我不喜欢像这样处于大庭广众之下。

String.Source: It will be permanent if we kill you as well.
String.Dest: 要是我把你也杀了就能让它变成永久的。

String.Source: Nasrin...I have to ask. This assassin with the yellow eyes...is her name Sahlene?
String.Dest: 纳瑟琳……我必须得问。这位拥有金黄色瞳孔的刺客……她的名字是索伦吗？

String.Source: Alright, we'll bite. Who's next on the list?
String.Dest: 好，成交。下一个是谁？

String.Source: Well, my partner and I are here to help. And that means you're going to live a long life and die old and gray.
String.Dest: 嗯哼，我跟我的兄弟是来帮忙的。也就是说，你可以活很久，活到又老又臭。

String.Source: You mean he's one of the locals? Damn, I guess I still haven't met everyone in town.
String.Dest: 你是说他是这里的乡民之一？该死的，我猜我还没能见过这城里的所有人。

String.Source: That assassin we killed, was he yours?
String.Dest: 刺客我们已经干掉了，他是你的人吗？

String.Source: Oh, he is? Maybe I'm seeing ghosts. It wouldn't be the first time.
String.Dest: 哦，是吗？那我大概是撞鬼了，而且已经不止一次地撞鬼了。

String.Source: Are you saying you don't remember? The nightblades...Deneris...Wanderer's Rest? And is that mead I smell on your breath?
String.Dest: 你说你都不记得了？夜莺......丹尼勒斯......流浪者歇脚点这些都是？我从你呼出的气中闻到的不是蜜酒味？

String.Source: And who in Oblivion are you?
String.Dest: 你他妈谁啊？

String.Source: But Deneris is a ghost. Nightblade or not, it would be hard for him to move around unseen.
String.Dest: 但丹尼勒斯是个幽灵。不管他是不是夜莺，对他来说想要不被看见的走来走去是很困难的。

String.Source: Curses! Traps everywhere. But she can't hide from us.
String.Dest: 真该死！到处都是陷阱。但是她可躲不掉我们。

String.Source: Besides, I already have a suspect. I think that one-eye man showed up right around the time our friend Gancielo disappeared.
String.Dest: 另外，我已经找到了一个嫌疑犯。那个独眼龙差不多就是在甘西尔罗消失的时候出现的。

String.Source: I see. And without the river to fall in, it makes for a tough jump. It's a risky plan, and we still need to clear the top level for archers.
String.Dest: 我懂了。但没有河水做缓冲的话，要往下跳可是个难事儿。这个计划很冒险，而且我们还需要把上面的弓箭手清理干净。

String.Source: So she used magic on you.
String.Dest: 于是她对你使用了魔法。

String.Source: Fine. So long as you don't mind us following you.
String.Dest: 很好。只要你不介意我们跟着你。

String.Source: He just showed up at the Skeever a couple nights ago, right when Gancielo disappeared. I don't think that's a coincidence.
String.Dest: 他前几天晚上出现在了Skeever，也就在那时，甘西尔罗失踪了。我不认为这是个巧合。

String.Source: All right, I'll do some investigating on my own while I wait.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会在等待的时候独自做些研究。

String.Source: Oh, you're here, and just in time. Someone was murdered, right in front of the guard.
String.Dest: 哦，你在这里啊，时间刚刚好。某人被谋杀了，正确的来说在护卫前面。

String.Source: Fine. We can take the carriage there or use the roads, but we should hurry.
String.Dest: 很好。我们可以在那里乘马车或者走主路，不过我们得快点儿。

String.Source: I don't know. But there's some one-eyed man living at the Skeever I've never seen before. I was about to confront him when the commotion started.
String.Dest: 我不知道。不过雪鼠旅馆里有个我从没见过的独眼龙。到时候要是骚乱一起我就跟他当面对质。

String.Source: I guarantee you he knows something.
String.Dest: 我打赌你知道点什么。

String.Source: And look at the way he's dressed. Remind you of anyone? Something tells me if we took off his gloves, one of his fingers would be painted black.
String.Dest: 看一下他的穿衣风格。有没有让你想起某个人。我敢打赌如果我们摘掉他的手套，会发现他一根手指是被涂黑的。

String.Source: Well, I don't know, it was worth a shot. I didn't notice him until the other day, and he looked awfully suspicious walking into the Skeever.
String.Dest: 好吧，我不知道，人们应该注意到才对啊。直到某天他一脸可疑极了的样子走进眨眼雪鼠的时候，我才注意到有他这么一个人。

String.Source: You should stay on the same level, but not too close.
String.Dest: 你应该处在同一高度，但不要太靠近。

String.Source: The guards might be too busy with all that's going on. I should know, I used to be one, and it disgusted me how often we relied on outside help.
String.Dest: 要守卫们处理这所有的事，他们恐怕会焦头烂额吧，我也曾做过守卫，总是依靠外界的帮助这点挺让我厌恶的。

String.Source: Go check on Krillo. I'll be fine.
String.Dest: 去问Krillo. 我没事.

String.Source: So how did you meet?
String.Dest: 所以你们是怎么见面的?

String.Source: So the old man's set up a routine. Which likely means our assassin has studied it.
String.Dest: 所以那个老头儿的作息很有规律。这可能意味着我们的刺客已经将它研究透了。

String.Source: Yellow eyes? It couldn't be...
String.Dest: 黄色的眼睛？那不会是……

String.Source: I thought the Forsworn wielded dual weapons. The males, anyway.
String.Dest: 我想弃誓者都会用双持武器。好吧，至少男性弃誓者都会。

String.Source: And leave your back completely exposed? But why? Unless...Shor's bones, you're baiting her!
String.Dest: 让你的后背完全暴露？为什么？除非……舒尔的圣骨啊，你引诱她！

String.Source: We should come back tomorrow and keep a close eye on him. I'll get up early and make sure the high ground is clear.
String.Dest: 我们明天应回去盯紧他， 我会起早一点然后确保高地被清理完毕的。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: I might mistake you for Lorne if he weren't a sodding corpse. Now come on, I need you sober when we interrogate this one-eyed man.
String.Dest: 如果Lorne不是已经变成死尸我可能会把你跟他弄混. 现在, 我要你在审问这个独眼人的时候冷静下来.

String.Source: Blast! What do you think? I don't trust this one, but he's our only lead.
String.Dest: Blast!你怎么看？我可不信任这家伙，但是又没其他人选。

String.Source: You...you better get back. If this is another misdirection, chasing this trail could end up getting Krillo killed.
String.Dest: 你……你最好回去。如果这是另外一个错误的指示，继续沿着这条小路走最后会让科瑞奥被杀掉的。

String.Source: (Sigh) I suppose it wasn't much of a lead to begin with. But maybe we'll find some clues at the inn.
String.Dest: （叹气）我想这不是什么好开端。不过我们也许能在这家小旅馆里找到什么线索。
